page-developers-index.page-developers-frameworks-desc: Kayan aikin da suke taimakawa wajen ƙirƙira ci gabar sauri
page-developers-index.page-developers-gas-desc: Ana ɓuƙatar Ether don ƙarfafa cinikayya
page-developers-index.page-developers-get-started: Ta ya kuke so a fara?
page-developers-index.page-developers-improve-ethereum: Taimaka mana wajen saka ethereum.org ya fi haka
page-developers-index.page-developers-improve-ethereum-desc: Kamar dai ethereum.org, waɗannan dokin ƙoƙarin al'umma ne. Ka ƙirƙiri PR idan ka ga kuskure, wuri domin gyara, ko kuma sababbin zarafi don taimaka wa masu ƙera Ethereum.
page-developers-index.page-developers-intro-ether-desc: Gabatarwa zuwa kuɗin kiripto da Erher
page-developers-index.page-developers-intro-dapps-desc: Gabatarwa zuwa manhajoji masu cin gashin kansu
page-developers-index.page-developers-js-libraries-desc: Amfani da JavaScript wurin alaƙa da smart contract
page-developers-index.page-developers-language-desc: Ana amfani da Ethereum tare da sanannun harsuna
page-developers-index.page-developers-learn-desc: Karanta mahimman ra'ayoyi da adana Ethereum a cikin takaddun mu.
page-developers-index.page-developers-learn-tutorials-desc: Koyi haɓaka Ethereum daki-daki daga maginan dauka riga suka gina.
page-developers-index.page-developers-meta-desc: Takardu, koyarwa, da kayan aiki domin masu ƙirƙira su gina akan Ethereum.
page-developers-index.page-developers-mev-desc: An introduction to maximal extractable value (MEV)
page-developers-index.page-developers-mining-desc: Yadda aka ƙirƙiri sabbin blocks da kuma cimma yarjejeniya ta amfani da tabbacin-aiki
page-developers-index.page-developers-mining-algorithms-desc: Bayanai akan hanyoyin saukaka haƙar ma'adanan Ethereum
page-developers-index.page-developers-networks-desc: Bayanai kan Mainnet da hanyoyin sadarwa na gwaji
page-developers-index.page-developers-node-clients-desc: Yadda ake tantance blocks da cinikayya akan hanyoyin sadarwa
page-developers-index.page-developers-oracle-desc: Samun bayanan da ba a kan chain ba cikin smart contracts ɗinka
page-developers-index.page-developers-smart-contract-security-: La'akari da matakan tsaro a wurin ƙirƙirar smart contracts
page-developers-index.page-developers-setup-desc: Ka shirya jerinka domin ginawa ta wajen shirya yanayi na ci gaba.
page-developers-index.page-developers-smart-contracts-desc: Hikimar da ke bayan dapps - yarjejeniya masu gabatar da kansu
page-developers-index.page-developers-speedrunethereum-title: Koyi duka bayanai masu amfani wurin gini akan Ethereum
page-developers-index.page-developers-start-desc: Kana son jarabawa a fari, sa'anan ayi tambayoyi daga baya?
page-developers-index.page-developers-subtitle: Bayanan maginan Ethereum. Na magina, don magina.
page-developers-index.page-developers-token-standards-desc: Bayanai kan ma'aunin alamar cinikayya da aka amince
page-developers-index.page-developers-web3-desc: Yadda ingancin duniyar web3 take daban
page-developers-index.page-developers-networking-layer-desc: Gabatarwa zuwa layer na hanyoyin sadarwar Ethereum
page-developers-index.page-developers-data-structures-and-enco: Gabatarwa zuwa tsarin bayanai da kuma shigar da su a adanawar Ethereum
page-developers-index.alt-eth-blocks: Nuna jerin block kamar logo ɗin ETH

page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-bloomtech-descriptio: Kos ɗin Bloom Tech Web3 zai koya muku dabarun da ma'aikata ke nema a injiniyoyi.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-bootcamps-desc: An biya kwas na kan intanet saboda ka samu gudu, sauri.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-capture-the-ether-de: Ɗauka hoton Ether wasa ne wanda zaka kwache Ethereum smart contracts da ka kuyi akan tsaro.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-node-guardians-descr: Masu lura da Node wani dandamali ne na ilmantarwa wanda ke nutsar da masu haɓaka yanar gizo3 a cikin buƙatun jigo na almara don ƙware Solidity, Alkahira, Noir, da shirye-shiryen Huff.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-coding-subtitle: Waɗannan kayan aikin za su taimaka muku wurin gwaji tare da Ethereum idan kun fi son ƙarin ƙwarewar ilmantarwa.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-consensys-academy-de: Bootcamp na mai ƙirƙirar Ethereum na kan intanet.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-cryptozombies-descri: Koyi Solidity ta gina wasan Zombin ka.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-dapp-world-descripti: Tsarin yanayin haɓakawar blockchain, gami da darusa, tambayoyi, aikin hannu, da gasa na mako-mako.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-documentation-desc: Kana so ka koyi? Je zuwa takardun mu don ka samu bayanin da kake so.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-eth-dot-build-descri: Sandbox na ilimi don web3, gami da ja-da-saukar shirye-shirye da blocks na gina tushe.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-ethernauts-descripti: Ƙarasa matakan kuse a smart contracts.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-metaschool-descripti: Ka zamti mai ƙirƙiran Web3 ta hanayan ginawa da fitar da dApps.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-game-tutorials: Koyarwa na wasanni masu ɗaukar hankali
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-game-tutorials-desc: Koyo a lokacin da kake wasa. Wanan kuyarwa saya doke ka daga fari da amfari da wasa-wasa.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-meta-desc: Kayan aikin shafin intanet da koyar da dabaru don taimaka maka wajen sarrafa Ethereum.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-meta-title: Kayan aiki koyo na mai ƙirƙira
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-atlas-description: Rubuta, gwada, kuma tura smart contracts a cikin mintoci tare da Atlas IDE.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-questbook-descriptio: Koyar da kai don koyon Web 3.0 ta ginawa
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-remix-description: Gina, tura da gudanar da smart contracts na Ethereum da bin koyarwa tare da LearnEth plugin.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-remix-description-2: Sake haɗa, Replit, ChainIDE, da Atlas ba kaɗai sandboxes ba na masu ƙirƙira zasu iya rubuta, tattara da tura smart contracts ɗin su don yin amfani da su.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-replit-description: Wurin gina Ethereum da ake iya sarrafawa da sake saukewa, tare da duba matsalolli da taimakon testnet.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-chainIDE-description: Fara ta kan hanyar ku akan Web3 ta hanyar rubuta smart contracts na Ethereum ta amfani da ChainIDE domin gina samfura do koyan kula da lokaci.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-tenderly-description: Tenderly Sandabox shine wajen da zaka iya rubuta, zartarwa, da sake smart contract a burauza ta hanyar amfani da solidity da Javascript.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-sandbox-desc: Wanan sandboxes zai baka sarari sobida ka gwada rubuta smart contracts kuma ka gane Ethereum.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-speed-run-ethereum-d: Gudun Sauri na Ethereum irin saitin kalubale don gwadawa ilimi Solidity din ka da yin amfani da Scaffold-ETH
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-studio-description: IDE da ake gina shafin intanet inda zaku iya bin koyarwar yadda zaku ƙirƙira kuma ku gwada kwantraki na fikira, da gina musu fronted.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-vyperfun-description: Koya yadda ake gina Viper da gina wa kanka wasannin Pokémon.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-nftschool-descriptio: Yi bayani akan abunda ke tare da ayyukan kuɗi, ko NFTna ɓangaren fasaha.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-platzi-description: Kuyi yada ake gina dapps a kan Web3 ku kuma sarrafa duka basira da ake buƙata soboda ka zama mai habakawa na blockchain.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-alchemy-university-d: Bunƙasa aikin web3 dinka ta hanyar darussa, ayyuka da lamba.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-learnweb3-descriptio: LearnWeb3 is a free, high quality education platform to go from zero to hero in web3 development.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-cyfrin-updraft-descr: Learn smart contract development for all skill levels and security audits.
page-developers-learning-tools.alt-eth-blocks: Nuna jerin block kamar logo ɗin ETH

page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-brownie-desc: Tsarin haɓakawa na Python da gwajin smart contract da ke da niyya Virtual Injin na Ethereum.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-kurtosis-desc: A akawatin kayan aiki na tsrawa saboda saukin haɗasu da juyawan abokan cinikin da yawa a Ethereum yanan goda saboda saurin ginuwar manhajan gida, samfuri da godawa.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-epirus-desc: A dandali mai haɓaka, turawa da kulawar manhajan Blockchain akan maida-kama-gaskiya Injin Java.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-eth-app-desc: Ƙirƙiri manhajojin ƙarfafa Ethereum da umurni ɗaya. Da zai kawo buɗaɗɗen haɗawar gangan-jikir UI da samfuri DeFi zaba acikin.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-foundry-desc: Ga mai bala'in sauri, marasa-nauyi da kayan aiki mai sauki na manhajan Ethereum da ake tayarma rubutun a Rustu.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-framework-feature: Siffofin da za a juya sama da misalin blockchain na gida.
Abubuwa don tattarawa da gwada kwangilolin ku na smart contract.
Ƙarin haɓakar abokin ciniki don gina manhajojin da ke fuskantar manhajar mai asusu a cikin aikin/majiya guda ɗaya.
Kwanfigareshan don haɗawa da hanyoyin sadarwa na Ethereum da tura kwangiloli, ko zuwa misali mai gudana a cikin gida, ko ɗayan hanyoyin sadarwar jama'a na Ethereum.
Rarraba manhajar da aka raba - haɗe-haɗe tare da zaɓuɓɓukan ajiya kamar IPFS.
Waɗannan tsarin sun zo da ayyuka da yawa daga tsarin cikin akwatin, kamar:
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-frameworks-desc: Muna ba da shawarar ɗaukan tsari, musamman idan yanzu kuka fara. Gina cikakken dapp na buƙatar nau'ikan fasaha daban-daban. Tsarukan sun haɗa da yawancin abubuwan da ake buƙata ko samar da tsarin plugin mai sauƙi don zaɓar kayan aikin da kuke so.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-frameworks-title: Tsarukan da aka riga aka fara yi
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-hardhat-desc: Hardhat shine ci gaban Ethereum don ƙwararru.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-openZeppelin-desc: Adana awowi na lokacin ingantawa ta hanyar tattarawa, haɓakawa, turawa, da yin hulɗa tare da smart contracts tare da CLI ɗin mu.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-scaffold-eth-desc: Ethers + Hardhat + React: duk abin da kuke buƙatar fara gina aikace-aikacen da ba a daidaita su da smart contracts.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-setup-meta-desc: Jagora kan yadda ake zaɓi tarin manhaja don inganta Ethereum.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-setup-subtitle: Idan kun shirya don fara yin gini, lokaci yayi da za ku zaɓi tari.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-setup-subtitle-2: Anan akwai kayan aiki da ma tsarin da zaku iya amfani da su don taimaka muku wurin gina manhajojin Ethereum.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-setup-title: Saita yanayin ci gaba na gida
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-solidity-template: Samfurin GitHub don saitin da aka riga aka gina don smart contracts na Solidity. Ya haɗa da cibiyar sadarwar gida ta Hardhat, Waffle don gwaje-gwaje, Ethers don aiwatar da walat, da ƙari.

page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorial-listing-policy-intro: Before you submit a tutorial please read our listing policy.
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorial-create-an-issue-desc: Fill out the issue template outlining your tutorial.
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorial-subtitle: Welcome to our curated list of community tutorials.
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorial-tags-error: There are no tutorials with all your chosen tags yet
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorials-meta-description: Browse and filter vetted Ethereum community tutorials by topic.
page-developers-tutorials.page-find-wallet-try-removing: Try removing a feature or two
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorials-env-banner: Don't commit .env! Please make sure never to share or expose your .env file with anyone, as you are compromising your secrets in doing so. If you are using version control, add your .env to a gitignore file.

page-eth.page-eth-buy-some-desc: Ya zama gama gari haɗa Ethereum da ETH. Ethereum shine blockchain kuma ETH shine babban kadari na Ethereum. ETH shine abin da wataƙila kuke nema don siya.
page-eth.page-eth-cat-img-alt: Hoton ETH glyph tare da kaleidoscope na mage da yawa
page-eth.page-eth-collectible-tokens: Kuɗaɗe da za a iya tarawa
page-eth.page-eth-collectible-tokens-desc: Kuɗaɗen da ke waƙilta a tataranwan wasan abu, yanki na dijital fasaha, ko wasu musamman kadara yawanci da aka sani da kuɗaɗe marasa dahir (NFTs).
page-eth.page-eth-cryptography-desc: Kuɗin intanet shi zai iya zama sabo amma proven cryptography". Wannan zai tsare ma'adanan ka, ETH ka, da cinikin ka.
page-eth.page-eth-description: ETH shine kuɗin kiripto. Yana da ƙarancin kuɗi na dijital waɗanda za ku iya amfani da su akan intanet - kamar Bitcoin. Idan kun kasance sababbi ga kiripto, ga yadda ETH ya bambanta da kuɗin asali.
page-eth.page-eth-flexible-amounts: Akwai su a cikin adadi sassauƙa
page-eth.page-eth-flexible-amounts-desc: ETH yana bayyana har ya zuwa ƙaramin lamaba desimal 18 don haka baka buƙatar sayan 1 duk ETH. Kana iya sayan wanda ya rarraba a lokaci ɗaya kamar yadda yazo 0.000000000000000001 ETH in kana so.
page-eth.page-eth-fuels: ETH yana haɓakawa da tsaron Ethereum
page-eth.page-eth-fuels-desc: ETH shine tushen rayuwar Ethereum. Lokacin da aka aika ETH ko akayi amfani da manhajojin Ethereum, don amfani da hanyar sadarwar Ethereum. Wannan kuɗin abin ƙarfafawa ne ga mai yin toshe don aiwatarwa da tabbatar da abin da kuke ƙoƙarin yi.
page-eth.page-eth-fuels-desc-2: Masu tsutancewa na kama da masu rikodin na Ethereum-suna bincikawa kuma suna tabbatar da cewa babu wanda ke yin magudi. An zaɓe su ba da gangan ba sai don shawarar toshe ma'amaloli. Hakanan ana bawa masu tabbatar da wannan aikin da ƙaramin adadin sabbin ETH da aka fitar.
page-eth.page-eth-fuels-desc-3: Aikin da masu tantancewa ke yi, da jari hannun jari, yana kiyaye Ethereum amintacce kuma ba shi da ikon sarrafawa.
page-eth.page-eth-fuels-staking: Lokacin da kuka yi amfani da ETH ɗinku, kuna taimakawa amintaccen Ethereum kuma ku sami kyauta. A cikin wannan tsarin, barazanar rasa ETH yana hana masu kai hari.
page-eth.page-eth-gov-tokens-desc: Kuɗi waɗanda ke wakiltar ikon jefa ƙuri'a a cikin ƙungiyoyi masu rarrabuwa.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value: Me yasa ETH ke da ƙima?
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc: ETH yana da mahimmanci ta hanyoyi daban-daban wa mutane daban-daban.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc-2: Ga masu asusu da Ethereum, ETH yana da daraja saboda yana ba ku damar biyan kuɗin kasuwanci.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc-3: Wasu suna ganin shi azaman shagon sayar da dijital na daraja saboda ƙirƙirar sabon ETH yana rage jinkirin lokaci.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc-4: Kwanan nan, ETH ya zama mai mahimmanci ga masu amfani da manhajojin kuɗki akan Ethereum. Saboda zaku iya amfani da ETH azaman lamuni don kyautar kiripto, ko azaman tsarin biyan kuɗi.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc-5: Tabbas mutane da yawa suna ganin sa a matsayin saka hannun jari, mai kama da Bitcoin ko wasu kuɗaɗen kiripto.
page-eth.page-eth-is-money: Kuɗin Ether (ETH) kuɗin digital na duniya.
page-eth.page-eth-no-centralized-desc: ETH ba shi da guri takamamme a duniya. Babu kamfani ko banki da zai iya yanke shawarar buga ƙarin ETH, ko canza sharuɗɗan amfani.
page-eth.page-eth-not-only-crypto: ETH ba shine kawai kiripto akan Ethereum ba
page-eth.page-eth-not-only-crypto-desc: Kowa na iya ƙirƙirar sabbin nau'ikan kadarori kuma ya sayar da su a Ethereum. Ana kiran waɗannan da 'alamu'. Mutane sun ba da alamar kuɗin gargajiya, kadarorin su, fasaharsu, har ma da kansu!
page-eth.page-eth-not-only-crypto-desc-2: Ethereum wuri ne ga dubban kuɗaɗe- wasu sun fi amfani da daraja fiye da sauran. Masu haɓakawa koyaushe suna gina sabbin alamu waɗanda ke buɗe sabbin damar da za'a buɗe sabbin kasuwanni.
page-eth.page-eth-open-desc: Kuna buƙatar haɗin intanet da walat ne kawai don samun ETH. Bakwa buƙatar samun dama ga asusun banki don karɓar biyan kuɗi.
page-eth.page-eth-p2p-payments-desc: Kuna iya aika ETH ɗin ku ba tare da kowane sabis na tskiya ba kamar banki. Yana kama da bada kuɗi ga mutum, amma kuna iya yin shi amintacce tare da kowa, a ko'ina, kowane lokaci.
page-eth.page-eth-shit-coins-desc: Domin yin sababbin kuɗi abu ne mai sauƙi, kowa zai iya yin hakan - har ma da mutane masu mugun nufi ko ɓatacciya niyya. Yi bincike koyaushe kafin amfani da su!
page-eth.page-eth-stablecoins-desc: Kuɗaɗe waɗanda ke nuna ƙimar kuɗin asali kamar daloli. Wannan yana magance matsalar rashin daidaituwa tare da yawancin kuɗin kiripto.
page-eth.page-eth-underpins: ETH yana tallafawa tsarin kuɗin Ethereum
page-eth.page-eth-underpins-desc: Ba a gamsu da biyan kuɗi ba, al'ummar Ethereum suna gina tsarin kuɗi gabaɗaya wanda ke tsara-zuwa-tsara kuma mai isa ga kowa da kowa.
page-eth.page-eth-underpins-desc-2: Kuna iya amfani da ETH a zaman rance don ƙirƙirar kuɗin kiripto daban-daban akan Ethereum. Bugu da ƙari, za ku iya aro, bada rance da samun riba akan ETH da sauran alamun da ke goyan bayan ETH.
page-eth.page-eth-weth: Nannaɗe ether (WETH) ana amfani don ƙaddamar da aikin ETH don yin aiki tare da wasu alamu da manhajoji. Ƙara koyo game da WETH.
page-eth.page-eth-uses: Buƙatar girman ETH na kowane rana
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc: Saboda Ethereum ana tsara shi, masu ƙirƙira kuma na iya tsara ETH ta hanyoyi masu yawa.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-2: A shekarar 2015 data wuce, abin da zaku iya yi shine aika ETH daga asusun Ethereum zuwa wani. Ga wasu abubuwan da za ku iya yi yau.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-3: biya kuɗin wani ko karɓar kuɗi akan lokacin.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-4: kuna iya cinikin ETH tare da sauran kuɗaɗe har da Bitcoin.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-5: kan ETH da sauran kuɗaɗen Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-6: samun damar iso ga duniyar kiripto tare da tsayayye, ƙima mara dahir.
page-eth.page-eth-whats-eth-hero-alt: Hoto na rukunin mutane masu mamaki kan kayataccen labari na ether (ETH)
page-eth.page-eth-whats-eth-meta-desc: Abin da kuke buƙatar sani domin fahimtar ETH da gurbinsa a cikin Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-whats-ethereum-desc: Idan kuna son ƙarin sani game da Ethereum, fasahar da ke bayan ETH, duba gabatarwar mu.
page-eth.page-eth-whats-unique: Wani abune ne na musamman game da ETH?
page-eth.page-eth-whats-unique-desc: Akwai nau'ikan kiripto da yawa da kuri'a na sauran kuɗi a kan Ethereum, amma akwai wasu abubuwa da kawai ETH zai iya yi.
page-eth.page-eth-where-to-buy-desc: Kuna iya samun ETH daga musaya ko walet amma ƙasashe daban-daban suna da manufofi daban-daban. Bincika don ganin ayyukan da za su ba ku damar siyan ETH.
page-eth.page-eth-yours-desc: ETH na ba ku damar ku zama bankin kan ku. Kuna iya sarrafa kuɗin ku tare da wallet a matsayin hujjar mallaka - babu wani ɓangare na uku da ya cancanta.
page-eth.page-eth-tokens-dao: Ƙungiyoyin sarrafa kansu na gashin kai (DAOs)
page-eth.page-eth-tokens-stablecoins-description: Ƙari akan kuɗi marasa ƙarfi na Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-tokens-defi-description: Tsarin hada-hadar kuɗi don Ethereum tokens.
page-eth.page-eth-tokens-nft-description: Kuɗin da ke wakiltar mallakar abubuwa akan Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-tokens-dao-description: Al'ummomi na shafin Intanet galibi ana gudanar da su ta masu riƙe da kuɗi.
page-eth.page-eth-whats-defi-description: DeFi tsarin hada-hadar kuɗi ne wanda aka gina akan Ethereum. Wannan yana bayanin abin da zaku iya yi.

page-gas.page-gas-meta-title: Farashin kuɗin Gas na Ethereum: yaya ne yake aiki?
page-gas.page-gas-meta-description: Koyo akan ladan aiki akan Ethereum: yadda suke aiki da kuma yadda za'a biya kuɗin gas mafi ƙaranci
page-gas.page-gas-hero-subtitle-1: Ladan aiki na yanar gizo na Ethereum sune ake kira gas.
page-gas.page-gas-hero-subtitle-2: Gas shine ku din aiki da yake ƙarfafa Ethereum.
page-gas.page-gas-summary-item-1: Ko wane musanya akan Ethereum yana bukatan mafi karayanci biya wajen aiki
page-gas.page-gas-summary-item-2: Waɗannan ladan aiki sune aka sani da' gas' fee
page-gas.page-gas-summary-item-3: Ba s saita kuɗin gas, suna canzawa bisa cunkoson hanyar sadarwa
page-gas.page-gas-what-are-gas-fees-text-1: Tunanin Ethereum kamar wani babban na'uran yanar gizo inda mutane zasu iya ayyuka kamar aika sakonnai ko shirye-shirye masu gudana. kawai kamar yadda yake a rayuwa ta gaske, wadannan ayyuka suna bukatar makamashi a yi.
page-gas.page-gas-what-are-gas-fees-text-2: A cikin Ethereum, kowane aikin lissafi yana da saita farashin "iska" Kudin iskar ku su ne jimlar kudin na ayyukan da ke cikin mushanyan su. Lokacin da kuka aika ciniki ko gudanar a mai hankalin kwantaragi, zaka biya a cikin kuɗin iska don sarrafa shi.
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-header: Ta yaya zan biya kasa da kuɗin gas fee?
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-text: Yayin da ƙarin kuɗaɗe akan Ethereum wasu lokuta ba makawa, akwai dabaru za ku iya amfani da su don rage farashi:
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-card-1-de: Kamar yadda tafiye-tafiye a lokacin da babu yawan jama'a kuma ya fi araha, Ethereum ya fi arahar amfani a lokacin da Arewacin Amurka ke barci.
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-card-2-de: Farashin gas yana hawa da sauka kowane daƙiƙa goma sha biyu bisa yadda Ethereum yake cunkosowa. Sa'ad da farashin gas ya yi yawa, jira na 'yan mintoci kadan kafin ka yi ciniki zai iya rage kuɗin da kake biya sosai.
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-card-3-de: Sarkokin Layer-2 suna gine ne a kan Ethereum, suna ba da kananan kuɗaɗe da kuma sarrafa karin ma'amaloli. Sun zama kyakkyawan zabi don adana kuɗi don hada-hadar kuɗi ba sa buƙatar faruwa akan babban hanyar sadarwar Ethereum.
page-gas.page-gas-what-causes-high-gas-fees-heade: Me ke sa farahshin kuɗin gas tsada?
page-gas.page-gas-what-causes-high-gas-fees-text-: Duk lokacin da adadin lissafi (gas) a Ethereum ya wuce wani iyaka, farashin gas yana fara tashi. Da zarar kuɗin gas ta wuce wannan iyaka, da sauri farashin gas zai ƙaru.
Abubuwa da za su iya sa kuɗingas tsada manhajojin da aka rarraba (dapps) ko NFTs, habaka ciniki na lokaci-lokaci akan DEXs, ko dimbin yawan ayyukan masu amfani a lokuta mafi girma.

Masu ƙirƙira a kan Ethereum ya kamata su kula da inganta amfani da kwangilar mai wayo kafin turawa. Idan mutane da yawa suna amfani da kwangilar mai wayo a ckin hanyar da be kama ta ba, zai cinye karin gas kuma zai iya haifar da cunkoso na cibiyar sadarwa.
page-gas.page-gas-attack-of-the-cryptokitties-tex: A Nuwamba 2017, an kaddamar da mashahurin aikin CryptoKitties. Saurin haɓakarsa a cikin shahararsa ya haifar da cunkoson cibiyar sadarwa da tsadar kuɗin gas sosai. Kalubalen da CryptoKitties ya haifar sun habaka gaggawar neman mafita don habaka Ethereum.
page-gas.page-gas-why-do-we-need-gas-header: Me yasa muke buƙatar kuɗin gas?
page-gas.page-gas-why-do-we-need-gas-text: Gas abu ne mai mahimmanci wajen kiyaye Ethereum da sarrafa kasuwanci. Gas yana taimakawa a hanyoyi da yawa:
page-gas.page-gas-benefits-1-description: Gas yana ajiye Ethereum juriya-sybil ta hanyar hana masu aikata mugunta daga mamaye hanyar sadarwa tare da ayyukan yaudara.
page-gas.page-gas-benefits-2-description: Saboda kididdigewa na amfani da kuɗin gas, sauke Ethereum tare da kuɗaɗe masu yawa, ko ba da gangan ba ko kuma da mugunta, zai shafi kuɗin ku.
page-gas.page-gas-benefits-3-description: Babban-iyaka akan adadin ƙididdiga na da za a iya yi a kowane lokaci ya hana Ethereum daga mamayewa, yana taimakawa don tabbatar da hanyar sadarwa koyaushe na samun dama.
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-header: Ta yaya ake lissafin kuɗin gas?
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-text-1: Jimlar kuɗin gas da kuke biya ta ƙunshi yan sassa:
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-item-1: Kuɗin tushe: kudin da hanyar sadarwa ta saita wanda dole ne a biya don kasuwanci
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-item-2: Kudin fifiko: tukwici na zaɓi don ƙarfafa masu aikin node don su tsari kasuwancinku
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-item-3: Rukuni na kuɗin gas da aka yi amfani da su *: ku tuna mun ce kuɗin gas yana wakiltar lissafi? Ayyuka masu rikitarwa, kamar hulda tare da kwangila mai wayo, su fi amfani da kuɗin gas fiye da masu ayyuka kamar aika kuɗi.
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-list-item: * Duba sashi na 1 don ganin bamabncin yawan kudin gas da hada-hadar kuɗi ke amfani da su
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-text-2: Dabarar kididdige kuɗin gas shine rukuni na kuɗin gas da aka yi amfani da shi * (kudin tushe + kudin fifiko). Yawancin walat ɗin za su lissafta amfani da kuɗin gas kuma su nuna shi ta hanya madaidaiciya.
page-gas.page-gas-table-figure: Sashi na 1: Kuɗin gas da aka yi amfani da shi ta hanyar hada-hadar kuɗi
page-gas.page-gas-table-header-2: Rukunin kuɗin gas da aka yi amfani da su
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-1-q: Waye zai biyan kuɗin gas na cinikin da na yi?
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-1-a-1: Yawancin kuɗin gas - kuɗin tushe - an lalata shi ta hanyar yarjejeniya (ƙone). Za a ba da kudin fifiko, idan an haɗa shi cikin cinikayyar ku, ga mai tantancewa wanda ya nemi kasuwancin.
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-1-a-2: Kuna iya karanta cikakken bayanin tsari a cikin takardun masu ƙirƙira na gas.
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-2-q: Ina buƙatan biyan gas a cikin ETH?
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-2-a-1: E. Dole ne a biya duk kuɗin gas a kan Ethereum a cikin kuɗin ETH na asali.
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-3-a-1: A mafi yawan walet ko na'urar gano kuɗin gas, zaku ga farashin kuɗin gas da ake kira 'gwei'.
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-3-a-2: Gwei ƙarami na'ura na ETH ne kawai, kamar yadda dinari da dala, da bambanci kasancewa cewa 1 ETH daidai ne da 1 biliyan gwei. Gwei yana da amfani yayin da ake magana game da ƙananan adadin ETH.

page-get-eth.page-get-eth-article-store-digital-asset: Yadda ake aje kuɗin dijital a Ethereum
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-cex-desc: Musayar wasu kasuwanci ne da suke hanya da za ku siya kiripto da kuɗi. Suna da dama akan ko wane irin ETH da ka siya har sai ka turo zuwa walet da take ƙarƙahin ikon ka.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-description: Babu wata hukuma mai kula da gudanar da Ethereum - ita ce ke cin gashin kanta.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dex: Cinikayya da ke cin gashin kansu (DEXs)
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dex-desc: Idan kuna son karin iko, saya ETH ta amfani da smart contracts. Ta DEX za ku iya kasuwanci da kadarorin dijital ba tare da taba ba da ikon sarrafa kuɗin ku ga kamfani na tsakiya ba.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-peers-desc: Da zarar kuna samu asusun Ethereum, duk abin da kuke buƙatar yi shi ne raba adireshinku don fara aikawa da karɓar ETH (da sauran alamun) a tsakanin takwarorinsu.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-staking-desc: In dama kuna da wasu ETH, za ku iya samun ƙari ta hanyar gudanar da node na tabbatarwa. Za a biya ku don yin wannan aikin tabbatarwa a cikin ETH.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-earn-desc: Kuna iya samun ETH ta hanyar aiki don DAOs ko kamfanonin da ke biyan kuɗi a cikin kiripto, cin nasarar samun kyauta, gano matsala na cikin manhaja da sauran su.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-staking-link-desc: Koyi ƙari game da adana kuɗi
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs: Cinikayya da ke cin gashin kansu (DEXs)
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs-desc: Musanyar ko'ina ta buɗede kasuwanni ne don ETH da sauran kuɗi. Suna haɗa masu siye da masu siyarwa kai tsaye.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs-desc-2: Maimakon amfani da amintaccen ɓangaren uku don kiyaye kuɗi a cikin cinikayya, suna amfani da lamba. Za a canza wurin ETH na mai siyarwa lokacin da aka tabbatar da biyan kuɗi. An san wannan nau'in lambar a matsayin smart contracts.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs-desc-3:
Wannan yana nufin cewa akwai ƙarancin nauo'in zaɓuka a wannan sashen.
Idan akwai wanda zai sayar maka da wani haja kuma zai gamsu da duk nau'in biyan da za ka yi masa, za ku samu dacewa.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs-desc-4: Bayanan kula: yawancin dexes suna amfani da nannaɗe ether (WETH) don aiki. kara koyo game da nannaɗe ether.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-disclaimer: Mun tattara wannan bayanin da kan mu. Idan kun kalli wani abu ba daidai ba, ku sanar da mu a
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-empty-state-text: Shigar da ƙasar da kake zaune don ganin jerin musayar da za ka iya amfani da su
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-header: A wane ƙasa kake da zama?
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-intro: Musayar suna da iyaƙa akan inda zasu iya siyar da kiripto. Wannan jerin bayanai ne na ayyukan da ake zaton za su yi aiki a kowace kasa. Mahadi a nan ba tallafi bane—ya kamata ku yi binciken kanku!
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-no-exchanges: Haƙuri, ba mu san kowane musayar da ke ba ku damar siyan ETH daga wannan ƙasar ba. Idan kun sani, gaya mana a
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-no-exchanges-or-w: Hakuri, bamu san wani musayar siayan ETH daga ƙasar nan ba. Idan kun sani ku giya mana a
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-no-wallets: Hakuri, bamu san wani walet da zai baka damar siyar da ETH daga ƙasar nan ba. Wanda ya sani ya gaya mana
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-search: Shigar da wurin da kake zama...
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-success-exchange: Zai iya ɗaukar kwanaki da yawa don yin rajista tare da musayar saboda binciken su na doka.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-success-wallet-pa: Ina kake zaune, zaka iya siyan ETH kai tsaye daga walet ɗinka. Ƙarin bayani game da haka
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-meta-description: Yadda ake siyan ETH kan bisa inda kuke da zama da shawara kan yadda ake kula da shi.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-need-wallet: Za ka buƙaci walet domin amfani da DEX.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-new-to-eth: Sabo ga ETH? Ga wani bayani na farawa.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-protect-eth-desc: Ɗaya daga cikin manyan fasalulluka na Ethereum shine ku ci gaba da sarrafa dukiyar ku ta hanyar sarrafa asusun ku. Wannan yana nufin ba lallai ne ka amince da wani bangare na uku da kadarorinka ba, kuma ana kiyaye ka daga duk wani ma'aikacin da ke yin rashin gaskiya, yin fatara ko yin kutse. Koyaya, hakan yana nufin ku ɗauki alhakin tsaron ku.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-security: Wannan yana nufin kana bukatar ka ɗauki tsaro da kuɗi da muhimmanci. Tare da ETH, ba ka amincewa da banki ko kamfani don kula da dukiyarka, kana ɗaukar kua da kanka.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-smart-contract-link: Ƙarin bayani game da smart contracts
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-swapping: Musanya kuɗinku don ETH na wasu mutane. Da kuma akasin haka.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-use-your-eth-dapps: Yanzu da ka mallaki ƴan wasu ETH, duba wasu manhajojin Ethereum (dapps). Akwai dapps don kuɗi, kafofin watsa labaru, wasanni da sauran nau'ikan.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-wallet-instructions-lost: Idan kun rasa damar shiga asusunku, za ku rasa kuɗin ku. Walat din ku ya kamata ya ba ku umarni kan ƙariya daga wannan. Tabbatar kun bi su cike da kulawa—a mafi yawan lokuta, babu wanda zai iya taimaka muku idan kun rasa damar shiga asusunku.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-wallets-purchasing: Wasu walet ɗin suna ba ku damar siyan kiripto tare da katin zare kuɗi/kiredit, canja wurin banki ko ma Apple Pay. Ana amfani da iyaƙancewa na yanki.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-warning: Waɗannan DEXs ba na masu farawa bane saboda kuna buƙatar wasu ETH don amfani da su. Waɗannan misalai ne kawai, ba kayayyakin da aka yarda da su ba. Yi naku bincike!
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-where-to-buy-desc: Kuna iya samun ETH, samun shi daga takwarorinku, ko saya shi daga musayar da manhaja.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-where-to-buy-desc-2: Duba wane sabis ne zaka iya yin amfani da shi gurin da kake zama.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-your-address-desc: I dan kuka sauke walet zai samar muku da adireshin ETH na jama'a. Ga yadda yake:
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-your-address-desc-3: Ka ɗauki wannan kamar adireshin imel ɗinka, amma maimakon wasiku zai na karɓar ETH. Idan kana son canza wurin ETH daga musayar zuwa walet ɗinka, yi amfani da adireshinka a matsayin wurin zuwa. Ka tabbata ka duba sau biyu kafin ka aika!

page-index.page-index-activity-description: Ayyuka dukka daga sadarwa na Ethereum
page-index.page-index-bento-header: Sabon hanyar yin amfani da intanet
page-index.page-index-bento-assets-content: Zane-zane, takardu na shaidar mallaka ko ma kadarorin zahiri za a iya maida su zuwa kuɗi. Komai na iya zama abin ciniki a matsayin token. Mallaka tana bayyana a fili kuma za a iya tabbatar da ita.
page-index.page-index-bento-dapps-content: Manhajojin Ethereum suna yin aiki ba tare da siyar da bayananku ba. Kare sirrinku.
page-index.page-index-bento-defi-content: Biliyoyi ba za su iya buɗe asusun banki ko amfani da kuɗinsu yadda suka so ba. Tsarin kuɗi na Ethereum koyaushe a buɗe yake kuma ba shi da son zuciya.
page-index.page-index-bento-networks-content: Ethereum fage ne na fasahar hada-hadar kasuwancin bulokcen. Ana samar da manyan ayyuka ne a Ethereum.
page-index.page-index-bento-stablecoins-content: Sulalla-daidaitattu wasu kuɗaɗe ne da ke da daidaitacciyar daraja. Farashinsu daidai ya ke da Dalar Amurka ko wasu daidaitattun kadarori.
page-index.page-index-builders-action-primary: Shafin Intanet Na Masu Haɓaka Kirifto
page-index.page-index-builders-description: Ethereum wani gida ne na katafariyar fasahar Web3 kuma babbar maɓuɓɓugar gudanar da kadarorin dijital. Yi amfani da JacaScript da Python, ko kukoyi yadda za ku yi amfani da fasahar yare kamar su Solidity ko Vyper don tsara manhajarku.
page-index.page-index-builders-header: Mafi girman al'ummar haɓaka fasahar Bulokcen
page-index.page-index-community-description-1: Ɗaruruwan masu fassara, masu tsara ɗalasimai, masu yin tsari, marubuta da zaratan mambobin al'umma ne suke haɓaka shafin intanet ɗin ethereum.org a kowane wata.
page-index.page-index-community-description-2: Ku zo ku yi tambayoyi, ku sadu da mutane a sassan duniya kana ku ba da gudunmowa ga shafin na intanet. Za ku sami ilimi da ya dace kuma za a nuna maku yadda komai ya ke a yayin aiwatar da tsarin!
page-index.page-index-community-description-3: Al'ummar Ethereum.org shine wurin da ya fi dacewa a fara kuma a koya.
page-index.page-index-description: Dandalin da ke jagorantar ƙirƙirarrun manhajoji da cibiyoyin bulokcen
page-index.page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Samar da bankin da tunaninku ke ƙarfafa ma wa
Ƙirƙiri kadarorin dijital waɗanda za ku iya yin tiransifa tare da amfani da su a dukkan manhajoji
Yi amfani da harsunan da ake da su a halin yanzu don yin hulɗa da Ethereum da sauran manhajoji
Sake yin tunani game da ayyukan da ke wanzuwa a matsayin waɗanda aka saki, buɗaɗɗun manhajoji
page-index.page-index-events-action: Duba dukkan abubuwan da ke faruwa

page-index.page-index-values-ownership-legacy-conte: Tare da banki na yau da kullun ko dandalin sada zumunta, ƙungiyar ke sarrafa kadarorin ku da bayanan ku. Kun dogara gare su don samun damar shiga da sarrafawa.
Za a iya amfani da bayananka a hanyoyin da ba lallai ka amince da ita ba, bisa dokokin su.
page-index.page-index-values-ownership-ethereum-con: Tare da Ethereum, kaɗai ku ke da damar shiga da sarrafawa. Babu wanda zai taɓa iya amfani da kadarorin ku. Kuna iya yanke shawarar wanda za ku na ba da wannan damar.
page-index.page-index-values-fairness-legacy-conten: Yau, ba kowane ke da damar samun ayyuka na kuɗi ba. Wasu mutanen na iya fuskantar bambance-bambance wajen samun saboda wurin da suke ko kuma ƙasar su.
page-index.page-index-values-fairness-ethereum-cont: Mun amince cewa kowa ya kamata ya samu damar samun fa'idodi daga tsarin duniya. Saisa Ethereum ke ba da damar kyauta daidai wa kowa a faɗin duniya, ko da kuwa kai waye ne k kuma daga inda ka fito.
page-index.page-index-values-privacy-legacy-content: Ba za muna tsammanin gwamnati, ƙungiyoyi, ko wani taro babba, ƙungiyoyin da ba a san su ba da su tsare mana sirri daga nasu agajin ba.
Yawancin manhajojin suna tara bayanan sirrin ka iya iyawar su don su iya samun daidaita tallace-tallacen su.
page-index.page-index-values-privacy-ethereum-conte: Al'ummar Ethereum na girmama sirri. Ku kuna da damar amfani da manhajoji ba tare da bayyana kanku ba ko kuma bayanan tuntuɓarku.
page-index.page-index-values-integration-legacy-con: Yawancin manhajojin suna tura ku kan ku buɗe asusu daban-daban, don ya baku wahala wajen tuna bayanan shiga da kuma na rajista.
page-index.page-index-values-integration-ethereum-c: Tare da Ethereum, kuna iya sake amfani da asusu ɗaya a cikin duka manhajojin a maimako. Ba a buƙatar yin rajista ɗai-ɗai ko.
page-index.page-index-values-decentralization-legac: Kamfanonin mamallakin ƴan kasuwa ne ɗai-ɗaiku da masu rike hannun jari.
page-index.page-index-values-decentralization-ether: Kamar dai ita kanta intanet, Ethereum ba mallakin kowa bane. Kaɗai ana raba shi ne da kuma tsara shi daidai da kowa. Ba wani mamallaki guda wanda ke sarrafa shi.
page-index.page-index-values-censorship-legacy-cont: Dandamali na zamani da kuma ƙa'idodin na yawancin canzawa. Masu riƙe hannun jari na iya tasiri akan su, masu gudanar da kamfani koma taƙurin masu iko.
page-index.page-index-values-censorship-ethereum-co: Jure danniya na ɗaya daga cikin asalin muhimmancin Ethereum. Yanayin sarrafawa a koyaushe na zama cikin adalci da daidaito.
Ba wata ƙasar jiha da za ta iya sarrafa Ethereum, kamfani ko wani.
page-index.page-index-values-open-legacy-content-0: Kamfani na ƙare kadarorin fikira kuma ba za su raba su. Ba wani a wajen kamfanin da ke ganin yadda abubuwa suke gudana, gyara matsaloli, ku ƙara wani inganci. Yana wahala ga mutane su ƙirƙiri sabon kayan aiki ko adonta shi.
page-index.page-index-values-open-ethereum-content-: Ethereum na kowa ne. Kowa na iya amfani na gani, amfani, da kuma inganta lamba, yana sa ya yi sauki wa kowa.

page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-what-is-layer-2-1: Layer 2 (L2) is a collective term to describe a specific set of Ethereum scaling solutions. A layer 2 is a separate blockchain that extends Ethereum and inherits the security guarantees of Ethereum.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-what-is-layer-2-2: Now let’s dig into it a bit more. To do this we first need to explain layer 1 (L1).
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-what-is-layer-1-1: Layer 1 blockchains, such as Ethereum and Bitcoin, are the underlying foundation that layer 2 projects build on top of. Examples of layer 2 projects include zero-knowledge rollups and optimistic rollups on Ethereum and the Lighting Network on top of Bitcoin.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-what-is-layer-1-2: Ethereum also functions as a data availability layer for Layer 2s, and if there are any disputes on previous transactions data is provided from Ethereum for these disputes.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer-1-list-1: a network of node operators to secure and validate the network
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer-1-list-3: the blockchain itself and the history of transaction data
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-why-do-we-need-layer-: The three desirable properties of a blockchain are that it is decentralized, secure, and scalable. The blockchain trilemma states that a simple blockchain architecture can only achieve two out of three. Want a secure and decentralized blockchain? You need to sacrifice scalability. This is where layer 2 networks come in.

Ethereum has reached the network's current capacity with 1+ million transactions per day, with high demand for each of these transactions. The success of Ethereum and the demand to use it has caused gas prices to rise substantially. Therefore the need for scaling solutions has peaked as well.

The main goal of scalability is to increase transaction speed (faster finality), and transaction throughput (high transactions per second), without sacrificing decentralization or security (more on the Ethereum vision).

The Ethereum community has taken a strong stance that it would not throw out decentralization or security in order to scale. Until sharding, Ethereum Mainnet (layer 1) will only be able to process roughly 15 transactions per second. When demand to use Ethereum is high this causes network congestion, increasing transaction fees, and pricing out those who cannot afford it from using Ethereum until the fees reduce. That is where layer 2 comes in to scale Ethereum today.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer2Cards-1-descrip: By combining multiple transactions into a single transaction on layer 1, transaction fees are massively reduced, making Ethereum more accessible for all.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer2Cards-2-descrip: Layer 2 blockchains settle their transactions on the Ethereum Mainnet, allowing users who use them to benefit from the security of the Ethereum network.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer2Cards-3-descrip: With higher transactions per second, lower fees, and new technology, projects will expand into new applications with improved user experience.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-how-does-layer-2-work: As we mentioned above, layer 2 is a collective term for Ethereum scaling solutions that handle transactions off Ethereum layer 1 while still taking advantage of the robust decentralized security of Ethereum layer 1. A layer 2 is a separate blockchain that extends Ethereum. How does that work?

There are several different types of layer 2, each having their own trade-offs and security models. Layer 2s take the transactional burden away from the layer 1 allowing it to become less congested, and everything becomes more scalable.
Rollups bundle (or 'roll up') hundreds of transactions into a single transaction on layer 1. This distributes the L1 transaction fees across everyone in the rollup, making it cheaper for each user.

The transaction data in the rollup is submitted to layer 1, but the execution is done separately by the rollup. By submitting transaction data onto layer 1, rollups inherit the security of Ethereum. This is because once the data is uploaded to layer 1, reverting a rollup transaction requires reverting Ethereum. There are two different approaches to rollups: optimistic and zero-knowledge - they differ primarily on how this transaction data is submitted to L1.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-rollupCards-optimisti: Optimistic rollups use fault proofs where transactions are assumed to be valid, but can be challenged if an invalid transaction is suspected. If an invalid transaction is suspected, a fault proof is ran to see if this has taken place.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-rollupCards-zk-descri: Zero Knowledge rollups use validity proofs where transactions calculations are computed offchain, and then this data is then supplied to Ethereum Mainnet with a proof of their validity.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-dyor-title: Do your own research: Risks of layer 2
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-dyor-1: Because layer 2 chains inherit security from Ethereum, in an ideal world, they are as safe as L1 Ethereum. However, many of the projects are still young and somewhat experimental. After years of R&D, many of the L2 technologies that will scale Ethereum went live in 2021. This is not to say these L2s are not secure, only that no layer 2 is as battle tested as Ethereum Mainnet. Always do your own research and decide if you're comfortable with any risks involved.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-dyor-2: For more information on the technology, risks and trust assumptions of layer 2s, we recommend checking out L2BEAT, which provides a comprehensive risk assessment framework of each project.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-note-on-alt-l1-title: A note on alt L1s, sidechains, and validiums
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-note-on-alt-l1-1: Alternative layer 1s have higher throughput and lower transaction fees than Ethereum. These alt L1s have had to sacrifice on security or decentralization in order to achieve higher transactions per second and lower fees. The Ethereum ecosystem is firmly aligned that layer 2 scaling is the only way to solve the scalability trilemma and remain decentralized and secure
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-note-on-alt-l1-2: Sidechains and validiums are blockchains that allow assets from one blockchain to be bridged over and used on another blockchain. Sidechains and validiums run in parallel with the main chain, and interact with the main chain through bridges, but they do not derive their security or data availability from the main chain. They scale similarly to layer 2s, but have different trust assumptions. They offer lower transaction fees, and higher transaction throughput. More on sidechains and validiums.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-callout-1-description: Explore what is the practical impact of layer 2 solutions on user experience.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-callout-2-description: Learn how networks differ from each other and how far they have gotten in their development.

page-layer-2.page-layer-2-hero-description: Use Ethereum for a fraction of the cost.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-calloutCard-1-description: You can trade, send money globally, or use  applications without worrying about high costs.

page-layer-2.page-layer-2-powered-by-ethereum-descrip: Ethereum is no longer just a single network.
With hundreds of blockchains now built on top of it, Ethereum has become more cost-effective, faster, and accessible for everyday use.
Embrace the future by joining one of the many networks powered by Ethereum!
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-blockchain-transaction-cost: Average transaction cost on the Ethereum blockchain
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-networks-transaction-cost: Average transaction cost on Ethereum backed networks
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-network-of-networks-descrip: Ethereum's strength and security provides a platform for other networks to build upon. With a single account, everything is compatible and connects seamlessly.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-ready-to-start-description: Have a look at all the different networks that are available to you.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-why-do-we-need-multiple-net: Why do we need multiple networks on Ethereum?
Why are there all these networks and not just one Ethereum network?
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-faq-ExpandableCard-1-title: How do I know that a network is part of Ethereum?
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-faq-ExpandableCard-1-descri: There are many different ways one can categorize networks in relation to Ethereum. Many networks claim to be scaling Ethereum to gather popularity. However, one clear perspective is whether the network stores its data on the Ethereum main network. This greatly enhances user security and Ethereum's permissionless vision. Such projects are often called “rollups”. If data is stored somewhere else, then the project is not a direct Ethereum extension and is rather independent. Check out some of the most popular
Some specific industries might not require such direct close relationship such as gaming or non-financial applications where different technologies are better fit.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-faq-ExpandableCard-2-descri: While generally designed with robust security features, their safety depends on the underlying technology, smart contract security, and
Users should perform due diligence, starting with small transactions and staying updated on developments to ensure secure usage.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-faq-ExpandableCard-3-title: Why can't Ethereum scale its own chain instead of relying on these networks?
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-faq-ExpandableCard-3-descri: Ethereum can't easily scale its own main chain because it needs to stay secure and decentralized. Making the main chain faster could make it less secure and more centralized. Ethereum networks help by processing transactions off the main chain and then using the main chain for security, allowing Ethereum to handle more transactions without losing security or decentralization.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-faq-ExpandableCard-4-title: Why is there no 'official' Ethereum networks?
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-faq-ExpandableCard-4-descri: Just as there is no 'official' Ethereum client, there is no 'official' Ethereum layer 2. Ethereum is permissionless - technically anyone can create a layer 2! Multiple teams will implement their version of a layer 2, and the ecosystem as a whole will benefit from a diversity of design approaches that are optimized for different use cases. Much like we have multiple Ethereum clients developed by multiple teams in order to have diversity in the network, this too will be how layer 2s develop in the future.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-callout-1-description: Learn how networks differ from each other and how far have gotten in their development.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-callout-2-description: Curious about the technology and reasons for this scaling approach? Learn more about the thinking and different technological approaches.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-arbitrum-description: Arbitrum One is a general-purpose Optimistic Rollup built by Offchain Labs and governed by the Arbitrum DAO.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-base-description: Base is an Optimistic Rollup built with the OP Stack. It offers a low-cost and builder-friendly way for anyone, anywhere, to build onchain.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-optimism-description: OP Mainnet is an EVM-equivalent Optimistic Rollup. It aims to be fast, simple, and secure.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-blast-description: Blast is an EVM-compatible Optimistic Rollup supporting native yield.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-zksync2-description: ZKsync Era is a general-purpose ZK Rollup with full EVM compatibility.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-linea-description: Linea is a ZK Rollup powered by Consensys zkEVM, designed to scale the Ethereum network.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-scroll-description: Scroll is ZK Rollup that extends Ethereum’s capabilities through ZK tech and EVM compatibility.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-starknet-description: Starknet is a general purpose ZK Rollup based on STARKs and the Cairo VM.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-mode-description: Mode is an OP stack Optimistic Rollup building the AIFi economy.
page-layer-2.page-layer-2-taiko-description: Taiko is a decentralized, Ethereum-equivalent ZK-EVM rollup that enables seamless cross-chain communication.

page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-2014: View a 2014 blog post detailing proof of stake
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-2021: View a 2021 blog post on the Ethereum roadmap evolution
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-2022: View a 2022 blog post: The Hitchhikers Guide to Ethereum
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-2021-updates: View a 2021 blog post on the Ethereum Protocol Updates
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-desc-1: Ethereum needs to reduce network congestion and improve speeds to better service a global user base.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-desc-2: Running a node is getting harder as the network grows. This will only get harder with efforts to scale the network.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-desc-3: Ethereum uses too much electricity. The technology that keeps the network secure needs to be more sustainable.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-future: A digital future on a global scale
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-meta-desc: An overview of the impact upgrades will have on Ethereum, and the challenges they must overcome.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-scalability-desc: Ethereum needs to be able to handle more transactions per second without increasing the size of the nodes in the network. Nodes are vital network participants who store and run the blockchain. Increasing node size isn't practical because only those with powerful and expensive computers could do it. To scale, Ethereum needs more transactions per second, coupled with more nodes. More nodes means more security.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-scalability-desc-3: Layer 2 rollups scale Ethereum by moving transactions offchain and only posting summary data to Ethereum. This batching increases Ethereum's throughput while drastically reducing costs for users.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-scalability-desc-4: Rollups need low-cost storage on layer 1 to make transactions as cheap as possible for users. This will be provided in the form of blobs attached to Ethereum blocks. Eventually, many blobs will be attached to Ethereum blocks, providing cheap storage for many rollups.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-desc: The planned upgrades improve Ethereum's security against coordinated attacks.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-desc-3: In proof-of-stake additional security comes from greater crypto-economic disincentives against attack. This is because, in proof-of-stake, the validators who secure the network must stake significant amounts of ETH into the protocol. If they try and attack the network, the protocol can automatically destroy their ETH.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-desc-5: However, it is also important that upgrades that protect validators against denial-of-service attacks, enhance their anonymity, and separate block building and block propagation are implemented soon. These upgrades protect individual validators and the network as a whole against liveness attacks and censorship.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-desc-10: Staking also means you don't need to invest in elite hardware to participate directly in consensus. This should encourage more people to become a validator, increasing the network's decentralization and decreasing the attack surface area.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-security-validator: You can become a validator by staking your ETH.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-subtitle: Grow Ethereum until it's powerful enough to help all of humanity.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-sustainability-desc-: Ethereum is now a green blockchain. The energy consumption was reduced by ~99.95% when proof-of-work was swapped for proof-of-stake.
Ethereum is now secured via staking, not computing power.

This sustainability boost also brings security benefits - staked ether makes it much more expensive to attack the chain than under proof-of-work, but less expensive to secure it as less new ETH has to be issued to pay validators than miners.
The move to proof-of-stake made Ethereum greener and more secure. It is a low-carbon platform for building apps and organizations.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-sustainability-subti: Ethereum is a green blockchain with strong crypto-economic security.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-cardtext-1: Ethereum upgrades will make Ethereum scalable, secure, and decentralized. Staking has lowered the barrier to participation and limited economies-of-scale, creating a larger - more decentralized - network.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-cardtext-2: Secure and decentralized blockchain networks require every node to verify every transaction processed by the chain. This amount of work limits the number of transactions that can happen at any one given time. Decentralized and secure reflects the Ethereum chain today.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-cardtext-3: Decentralized networks work by sending information about transactions across nodes - the whole network needs to know about any state change. Scaling transactions per second across a decentralized network poses security risks because the more transactions, the longer the delay, the higher the probability of attack while information is in flight.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-cardtext-4: Increasing the size and power of Ethereum's nodes could increase transactions per second in a secure way, but the hardware requirement would restrict who could do it - this threatens decentralization. It's hoped that sharding and proof-of-stake will allow Ethereum to scale by increasing the amount of nodes, not node size.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-modal-tip: Tap the circles below to better understand the problems of decentralized scaling
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-p: A naive way to solve Ethereum's problems would be to make it more centralized. But decentralization is too important. It's decentralization that gives Ethereum neutrality, censorship resistance, openness, data ownership and near-unbreakable security.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-p-1: Ethereum's vision is to be more scalable and secure, but also to remain decentralized. Achieving these 3 qualities is a problem known as the scalability trilemma.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-p-2: Ethereum upgrades aim to solve the trilemma but there are significant challenges.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-trilemma-press-butto: Press the buttons on the triangle to better understand the problems of decentralized scaling.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc: The Ethereum protocol that launched in 2015 has had incredible success. But the Ethereum community always expected that a few key upgrades would be necessary to unlock Ethereum's full potential.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc-2: High demand is driving up transaction fees that make Ethereum expensive for the average user. The disk space needed to run an Ethereum client is growing at a fast rate.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc-3: Ethereum has a set of upgrades that address these problems and more. This set of upgrades was originally called 'Serenity' and 'Eth2,' and they've been an active area of research and development since 2014.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc-5: Now that the technology is ready, these upgrades will re-architect Ethereum to make it more scalable, secure, and sustainable - to make life better for existing users and entice new ones. All while preserving Ethereum's core value of decentralization.
page-roadmap-vision.page-roadmap-vision-upgrade-needs-desc-6: This means there's no on-switch for scalability. Improvements will ship incrementally over time.

page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-build-your-own-software-: Lokacin da ka shirya na'urar ka, zaka iya saukewa da tsarin aiki na DAppNode ta yin amfani da kowace kwamfuta kuma ka shigar a kan shigarwa da SSD ta USB drive.
Domin cikakkiyar kula, mai amfani ayna iya shirya amfani da jerin umarni a matsayin zaɓi.
Kula da matsalar cigaban mu domin cikakken bayani akan damar farawa da sashen abokin ciniki.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-buy-fully-loaded-descrip: Yi odar filogi da zaɓin wasa daga dillalai na kwarawa mafin saukakawa da dawowa hawa-hawa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-censorship-resistance-pr: Tabbacin hanya a lokacin da kake da buƙatarta, da barin tantancewa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-censorship-resistance-1: Node na wani daban na iya zaɓi akan cinikaiya daga adreshin IP na musammanma, ko cinikaiyan da ya shafi asusun ajiya na musamman, don haka yaba da damar dakatar daku daga amfani da hanyar sadarwan yanar gizo a sanda kuke buƙata shi.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-censorship-resistance-2: Don mallakar node domin a tura cinikaiya ga garanti da zaka iya watsa cinikayyan ku zuwa ga sauran hanyoyin sadarwan mutum-zuwa-mutum a kowani lokaci.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-community-description-1: Dandalin shafin intanet kamar Discord da Reddit gidane ga yawan lamba ne a maginan al'umma wajen son temaka da tambayoyi da zaka iya haɗuwa da su.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-community-description-2: Kar kaje kai kai kaɗai. In kana da tambaya zai yuwa wani anan ya temaka maka da amsa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-choose-your-adventure-1: Za ka buƙaci wasu na'urar da zaka fara da shi. Amma gudanar da manhajar 'node' zai yu akan kwanfutan mutum, ka na da natsetse mashin zaiyi matukar bunƙasa aikin 'node' din ka alhali yana rage tasirin ta a matakar farkon kwanfutan ka.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-choose-your-adventure-2: Lukacin zaɓar na'ura, la'akari da cewa chain zaye dinga girma, kuma dole akwai buƙatar a kula da shi. Karin ra'ayi da za ayi amfani gurin jinkiri na buƙatar kulawa da node.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-choose-your-adventure-bu: Mai arha da ƙara daidaito kaɗan na fasaha masu amfanuwa da shi.
Ko, zaɓi OS da aboki cinikin ka.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-decentralized-preview: Jurewa akan ƙarfafa tsakiya batun gazawa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-decentralized-1: Daidaita sabobin cloud zai iya samar da yawan karfin kwanfutan, amma za su samar da manufa ma katsa-jaha ko maharan neman su rushe hanyar sadarwa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-decentralized-2: Jurewar hanyar sadarwa akan samar da yawan 'node' cikin yankin wurare daban-daban, yuwa ga yawan mutane wajen sadarwan 'node' dinsu, dogaro akan tsakakkiya wajen raguwan gazawa, mayar da ƙarfin hanyar sadarwa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-further-reading-1-link: Ganancewar Ethereum - zan iya gudanar da Cikakken 'Node'
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-further-reading-2-link: Ethereum akan ARM - Fara Jagorar Sauri
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-getting-started-software: A farin lokacin hanyar sadarwa, masu amfani sun so su samu iyawa na amfani da rubutun-umarni soboda su yi aiki da Ethereum node.
Idan wannane ne abun da aka fi so, da ka samu gwaninta, ka sake jiki ka do ba fasahar mu na takardu.
Yanzu muna da DappNode, wanda shine kyauta da] buɗaɗɗen-tushen manhaja da ya bayarwa masu amfanuwa akanmanhaja-kamar kwarewa alhalin gudanar da 'node' ɗin sa.
Cikin ɗan danni kaɗan za ka iya samun 'node' sama da gudanarwa.

DAppNode ya mai dashi da sauƙi ga masu amfanuwa da gudanar da cikakke 'nodes', a haka ma ga P2P sadarwar, wanda babu bukatar tabawan layin-umurni. Wannan ya mai dashi mai sauki ga wanda zai shiga da kera yawan maran-tsakakkiya sadarwa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-hero-subtitle: Kasance mai cikakken iko a lkacin taimakawa wajen tsare hanyar sadarwa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-install-manually-1: In kai mai yawan amfani da fasaha ne kuma ka yanke shawarar nina naka na'uran, zaka iya sauke manhajar DappNode akan ko wace irin na'ura mai kwal-kwal wa da kuma wanda aka shigar cikin sabon SSD ta hanyar igiyar USB.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-meta-description: Sai gabatarwa akan me, saboda mene, da yadda za'a iya gudanar Ethereum 'node'.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-participate-preview: Shi maran tsakiya juyin juya hali na farawane da kai.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-participate-1: Ta hanyan gudanar da node kana iya zama ɗaya daga cikin tafiya tsarin sarrafawa da ƙarfafawa na dukkan bayanan dake faɗin duniya.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-participate-2: In ka kasance mai riƙewa, yana kawo daraja ga ETH dinka ta hanyar tallafawa da kawo tsarin hanyar sadarwa, sannan kana da damar magana a nan gaba.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-privacy-preview: Dakatar da bayar da damar sanin bayananka na sirri ga wani daban.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-privacy-1: A lokacin da kuke tura cinikaiyanku ta hanyar amfani da node na bayyane, bayananku a sirri na iya samuwa zuwa ga waninku irinsu adireshin IP da adireshin Ethereum da kuka mallaka.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-privacy-2: Ta hanyar nuna ajiyar walet da yayi daidai da node ɗinku kuna iya amfani da walet na ajiyarku domin sirrantawa da tsare blockchain.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-privacy-3: Sanna kuma, idan nodes da ke da haɗari suka rarrba cinikin da ba daidai ba, nodes ɗinka zas u dakatar dasu kai tsaye. Kowane cinikaiya ana tantanceshi a cikin na'urarka, don haka karka yarda da kowa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-title: Rubutu a kan Respberry Pi (sarrafawar ARM)
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-rasp-pi-description: Respberry Pis wasu kwamfutoci ne marasa nauyi kuma suna da saukin mallaka, amman suna da iyakan da zasu iya kawo cikas game da tafiyar da aiyukan nodes ɗinka duk da cewa ba'a ba da shawara dakatar dasu ba, wannan zai zama mafi soyuwa da sauki gun aiwatar da node don amfani kai, da mafi karancin 4 - 8 GB na RAM.

page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-staking-plans-descriptio: Don ƙara nagartan mai tantancewa, mafi ƙarancin 16GB RAM shi aka zaɓa, amman 32 GB yafi, da CPU wanda ya kai darajar 6667+ a cpubenchmark.net. sannan an ƙara zaɓenshi masu ajiyasuna da damar shiga mafi saurin banwidth na yanar gizo, duk da cewa wannan bai zama tilas ba.].
