EthStaker ya shiga cikin cikakkun bayanai a wannan lokaci mai tsayi na musamman
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-sovereignty-preview: Yi tunanin amfani da node kamar matakai na gaba fiye da yadda zaka samu walet na ajiyar Ethereum naka.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-sovereignty-1: Walet na ajiyar Ethereum na baka damar cikakken kula da sarrafa kadararka na dijital ta hanyar rike lambobin sirrinka na adreshinka, sai dai wa'innan lambobin sirrin basu baka bayanai game da blockchain, irinsu walet na abunda ya rage a ajiiyanka.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-sovereignty-2: Yadda aka tsara, walet na ajiyar Ethereum na iya riskar node din wani, misili kamar Infura ko Alchemy, a lokacin duba abinda ya saura. Amfani da node ɗinka na baka damar samu taswirar blockchain na Ethereum.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-meta-title: How to Run an Ethereum Node
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-voice-your-choice-previe: Kar ku bada damar sarrafa aukuwa na fork.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-voice-your-choice-1: A ɗan lokacin fork na chain, idan chain guda biyu suka haɗu da dokoki biyu ma bambamta, amfani da node ɗinku na tabbatar muku daman zaɓen wasu tsare-tsaren dokoki da kuka zaɓa. Wannan ya rage muku zabin ingantashi zuwa sabon samfari da suke iya daukan sabon tsari, kokuma akasin hakkan.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-voice-your-choice-2: Idan kuna amfani da ETH, gudanar da node ɗinka yana ba ku damar zaɓar abokin cinikin ku, don rage haɗarin skewa da amsa buƙatun hanyar sadarwar kan lokaci. Yin wasa tare da wani ɓangare na uku yana rasa ƙuri'ar ku akan wane abokin ciniki kuke tsammanin shine mafi kyawun zaɓi.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-what-1-text: Wanda aka sani da 'abokin ciniki', wannan manhajar tana sauke kwafin blockchain na Ethereum kuma ta tabbatar da ingancin kowane block, sannan ta ci gaba da sabunta shi tare da sabbin block da hada-hadar kuɗi, kuma tana taimaka wa wasu su sauke da sabunta kwafin nasu.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-what-2-text: An ƙera Ethereum don gudanar da node akan matsakaicin kwamfutocin masu asusu. Kuna iya amfani da kowace kwamfuta ta sirri, amma yawancin masu amfani sun zaɓi gudanar da kumburin su akan kayan aikin da aka keɓe don kawar da tasirin aikin akan injin su da rage raguwar lokacin node.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-what-3-text: Gudanar da node na Ethereum na iya zama mai rikitarwa a karon farko, amma kawai aikin ci gaba da gudanar da manhajar abokin ciniki akan kwamfuta yayin da aka haɗa shi da intanet. Yayin layi, node ɗinku kawai zai kasance baya aiki har sai ya dawo kan layi kuma ya sami sabbin canje-canje.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-who-title: Wane ya kamata ya gudunar da node?
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-who-preview: Kowa! Nodes ba kawai don shaidar-kuɗimasu tantancewa. Kowa na iya gudanar da node- ba kwa buƙatar ETH.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-who-copy-1: Ba kwa buƙatar kuɗi ETH don gudanar da node. A zahiri, kowane kulli ne akan Ethereum wanda ke ɗaukar masu inganci.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-who-copy-2: Wataƙila ba za ku sami kyautar kuɗi waɗanda masu tantancewa suke samu ba, amma akwai wasu fa'idodi da yawa na gudanar da kumburi ga kowane mai amfani da Ethereum don yin la'akari da su, gami da keɓantawa, tsaro, rage dogaro ga sabar ɓangare na uku, juriya na ƙididdigewa da ingantaccen kiwon lafiya da rarrabawa. hanyar sadarwa.
page-run-a-node.page-run-a-node-who-copy-3: Samun node ɗinku yana nufin ba kwa buƙatar amincewa da bayani game da yanayin hanyar sadarwar da wani ɓangare na uku ya bayar.

page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-crypto: Tare da Ethereum zaku iya aro kai tsaye daga wasu masu amfani ba tare da cinikin ETH ɗin ku ba. Wannan na iya ba ku girmaa- wasu suna yin haka don ƙoƙarin tara ƙarin ETH.

Amma saboda farashin ETH ba yawa, kuna buƙatar haɓaka haɗin gwiwa. Wannan yana nufin idan kuna son aron stablecoins guda 100 tabbas kuna buƙatar ƙimar ETH aƙalla $ 150. Wannan yana kare tsarin da masu ba da bashi.
Ƙarin bayani game da stablecoins da ke kiripto
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-places: Waɗannan dapps suna ba ku damar aro stablecoins ta amfani da kiripto azaman abin dogaro. Wasu suna karɓar wasu kuɗi da ETH.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-requir: Kana buƙatar walet don amfani da dapp
Kana buƙatar ETH don biyan kuɗi da/ko kuɗin kasuwanci
Dole kayi amfani da dapp ɗin da ya dace wajen rancen stablecoins. Kana kuma buƙatar walet da wasu ETH.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-risks-: Idan ka yi amfani da ETH a matsayin jingina sannan ƙimar sa ta faɗi, haɗin gwiwar jinginar ku ba zai rufe stablecoins da kuka ƙirƙira ba. Wannan zai sa ETH ɗin ku ya lalace kuma kuna iya fuskantar hukunci. Don haka idan kun karɓi stablecoins kuna buƙatar kallon farashin ETH.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-text-p: Kana iya amsa rancen stablecoins ta hanyar amfani da kiripto a matsayin jingina, wanda dole za ka biya daga baya.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-buy-requireme: Cinikayyar kiripto da walet masu yawa
Binciki ayyukan da za ka iya amfani da su a inda kake da zama

Asusun na haɗe da musaya ko walat da za ka iya siyan crypto daga ciki kai tsaye. Wataƙila kun riga kun yi amfani da ɗaya don samun ETH. Bincika don ganin waɗanna ayyuka za ku iya amfani da su a inda kuke zama.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-buy-text-prev: Da yawa daga cikin walat suna ba ku damar siyan stablecoins kai tsaye. Za a yi amfani da iyakancewa na yanki.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-buy-warning: Musanya na ko'ina na iya jera stablecoins kamar USDC, Tether, da sauransu. Wataƙila ba za ku iya siyan su kai tsaye ba, amma ya kamata ku iya musanya su daga ETH ko wasu cryptocurrencies waɗanda zaku iya siya akan dandamali.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-project-: Yawancin aikin fasaha don motsin manhaja mai buɗewa.
Fasaha, ƙunshin bayani, da sauran ayyuka don al'ummar MakerDao (ƙungiyar da ta kawo muku Dai).
A Lokacin da kuka san asalin kayanku, zaku iya nemo masalaha don samun Dai.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-projects: Akwai dandalin kala-kala da zasu na biyan ka da stablecoins idan ka musu aiki.
Wurin da za a samu stablecoins
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-requirem: Kana buƙatar walet don amsar stablecoins
Stablecoins hanya ce mafi kyau na biyan kuɗi don aiki da ayyuka saboda ƙimar ta tabbata. Amma kuna buƙatar walat don biya.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-text-pre: Kuna iya samun stablecoins ta hanyar aiki a ayyukan dake cikin yanayin muhalli na Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-dapp-int: Idan ka riga da ka sami ETH da wallet, za ka iya amfani da waɗannan dapps don musanya ga ma'auni.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-editors-: Samowa kan ka walet wanda zai ba ku damar siyan ETH da kuma ku canza shi zuwa kuɗi, har da stablecoins, kai tsaye.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-requirem: Kuna buƙatar walet don ba da izinin musanyawa da adana kuɗin ku
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-text-pre: Kuna iya karɓar mafi yawan stablecoins akan musaya maras wuri. Don haka zaku iya musanya kowane kuɗin da kuke da shi don stablecoin da kuke so.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-algorithmic-con-1: Akwai buƙatar amincewa (ko iya karatu) algorithm.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-algorithmic-con-2: Ragowar tsabar kuɗi zai canza bisa jimillar wadata.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-algorithmic-description: Waɗannan stablecoins ba su da tallafi da kowane kadara. Madadin haka algorithm zai sayar da alamu idan farashin ya faɗi ƙasa da ƙimar da ake so kuma yana samar da alamun idan ƙimar ta wuce adadin da ake so. Saboda adadin waɗannan alamun da ke cikin kewayawa yana canzawa akai-akai, adadin alamun da kuka mallaka zai canza, amma koyaushe zai nuna rabonku.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-algorithmic-disclaimer: Algorithmic stablecoins wasu fasahar gwaji ne. Ya kamata ku san haɗarin dake ciki kafin amfani da su.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-algorithmic-pro-2: Algorithm na jama'a ne suke sarrafa shi.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-bank-apy-source: Matsakaicin adadin da bankuna ke biya a asalin asusun ajiyar inshora na tarayyar, Amurka.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-bitcoin-pizza-body: A shekara ta 2010, wani ya sayi pizzas 2 akan bitcoin 10,000. A lokacin waɗannan kudi suna da darajar ~ $41 USD. A kasuwar yau kuma miliyoyin daloli suke. Akwai da yawa irin ma'amaloli masu nadama a cikin tarihin Ethereum. Stablecoins suna magance wannan matsalar, don haka zaku iya jin daɗin pizza ku riƙe ETH ɗin ku.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-coin-price-change: Canza farashin Coin (kwanaki 30 da suka gabata)
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-con-1: Kasa wajen daidaito fiye da stablecoins masu goyon bayan fiat.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-con-2: Kuna buƙatar ku sa ido kan ƙimar jinginar kiripto.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-descripti: Wadannan stablecoins suna goyan bayan wasu kadarorin kiripto, kamar ETH. Farashin su ya dogara da ƙimar kadara mai tushe (ko jingina), wanda zai iya zama mara ƙarfi. Saboda darajar ETH na iya canzawa, waɗannan stablecoins an cika su da juna don tabbatar da farashin ya tsaya kamar yadda zai yiwu. Wannan yana nufin yana da kusanci a faɗi cewa $1 na goyon bayan stablecoin na crypto yana da ƙayyadaddun kadara na kiripto wanda ya kai aƙalla $2. Don haka idan farashin ETH ya ragu, dole ne a yi amfani da ƙarin ETH don dawo da stablecoins, in ba haka ba za su rasa ƙimar su.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-pro-1: A bayyane kuma da cikakken rarrabuwa.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-pro-2: Saurin juyawa zuwa sauran kadarorin kiript.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-pro-3: Babu masu kula na waje - duk kadarorin ana sarrafa su ta asusun Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-dai-banner-body: Watakila Dai shine mafi shaharar karkataccen stablecoin. Ƙimar sa kusan dala ɗaya ne kuma ana karɓar ta a ko'ina cikin dapps.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-editors-choice-intro: Waɗanna mai yiwuwa da mafi sani misalai na stablecoins na gaskiya yanzu kuma da kuɗi muna samun sa da amfani a lokacin amfani da dapps.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-con-1: Na tsakiya – wani dole ya bayar da kuɗaɗe.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-con-2: Na buƙatar dubawa don tabatar da kamfanni ya tanada isar ajiya.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-description: Ainihin IOU (Ina bin ku) don kuɗin fiat na gargajiya (yawanci daloli). Kuna amfani da kuɗin fiat ɗin ku don siyan stablecoin wanda za ku iya shiga daga baya kuma ku fanshi don ainihin kuɗin ku.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-find-stablecoin-intro: Akwai stablecoins da yawa da basu canzawa. Ga shawarar yadda zaka fara idan kai sabo ne game da Ethereum, na farko shine bincike.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-hero-alt: Manya manyan stablecoin guda uku shahararru a kasuwanni sune: Dai, USDC, da kuma Tether.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-hero-header: Kuɗin dijital na amfani a koda yaushe
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-hero-subtitle: Smara canzawa su ne kuɗin Ethereum waɗanda suke da farashin tsaye bai canzawa ko da farashin ETH ya canza.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-meta-description: Gabatarwar stablecoins na Ethereum waɗanda ba su canzawa: menene su, ya ake samun su da kuma miye amfanin su.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-precious-metals-con-1: Na tsakiya – wani dole ya bayar da kuɗaɗe.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-precious-metals-con-2: Kana buƙatar amince da masu bada waɗannan kuɗaɗen da kuma inda ake tsare da ƙarafunar alfarmar.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-precious-metals-descrip: Kamar kuɗin fiat, a maimakon haka waɗannan stablecoins suna amfani da abubuwa kamar zinariya don kula da ƙimar su.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-prices-definition: Stablecoins sune cryptocurrencies ba tare da an canza ba. Suna da abubuwa iri ɗaya da yawa kamar ETH amma ƙimar su ta tsaya, kamar kudin gargajiya. Don haka kuna da damar samun tsayayyen kuɗi wanda zaku iya amfani da shi akan Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-research-warning: Ethereum sabon fasaha ce dakuma yawancin amfana. Tabbatar cewa kun san haɗarin da kuma ajiyar da kaɗai a ku iya hatsara.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-save-stablecoins-body: Stablecoins sau da yawa suna da matsakaicin saman riba saboda akwai buƙatu da yawa wajen rance su. Akwai dapps waɗanda ke ba ku damar samun kuɗin ruwa da stablecoins a asalin lokacin ta hanyar saka su cikin haɗakar rance. Kamar dai a cikin bankin duniya, kuna ba da kuɗi ga masu ba da bashi amma kuna iya janye alamun ku da sha'awar ku a kowane lokaci.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-saving: Sa ajiyar ku na stablecoin don amfani mai kyau kuma ku sami kuɗin ruwa. Kamar duk abin da ke cikin kiripto, Haɓaka Kashi na Shekara-shekara (APY) da aka amabta na iya canzawa kowace rana dangane da wadata/buƙata na asalin lokaci.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-dapp-callou: Bincika dapps na Ethereum - stablecoins a galibi suna da amfani ga kasuwanci na yau da kullun.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-dapp-descri: Kasuwanni don ɗimbin stablecins, gami da Dai, USDC, TUSD, USDT, da ƙari.
Ba da rancen stablecoins kuma a sami riba da $COMP kuɗin kai na Wuri.
Dandalin yin ciniki inda zaku sami kuɗin ruwa akan Dai da USDC ku.
Manhajar da aka ƙera don adana Dai.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-1: Stablecoins na duniya ne, kuma ana iya aika shi ta intanet. Suna da sauƙin karɓa ko aikawa da zarar kuna da asusun Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-2: Buƙatar stablecoins na da girma, don haka zaku iya samun riba don ba da rancen ku. Tabbatar cewa kuna sane da haɗari kafin ba da rance.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-3: Stablecoins ana musayar su wa ETH da sauran kuɗin Ethereum. Yawancin dapps sun dogara akan stablecoins.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-4: Ana kiyaye Stablecoins ta hanyar cryptography. Babu wanda zai iya ƙirƙira kasuwanci a madadin ku.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-stablecoins-meta-descri: Gabatarwar stablecoins na Ethereum waɗanda ba su canzawa: menene su, ya ake samun su da kuma miye amfanin su.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-table-error: An kasa loda stablecoins. Gwada sake sabunta shafin.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-meta-title: Stablecoins explained: What are they for?
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-top-coins: Kuɗi mafi yawa na jarin stablecoins na kasuwa
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-top-coins-intro-code: jimlar adadin kuɗin da ke wanzuwa an ninka ta da ƙimar kowace alama. Wannan jeri yana da ƙarfi kuma ayyukan da aka jerawa a nan ba lallai ba ne ƙungiyar ethereum.org ta amince da su.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-usdc-banner-body: Watakila USDC shine mafi shaharar kuɗin stablecoin. Ƙimar sa kusan dala ɗaya ne daga Circle da Coinbase da suke tallafa masa.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-why-stablecoins-body: ETH, kamar dai Bitcoin, yana da farashi mai canzawa saboda sabuwar fasaha ce. Don haka wataƙila ba za ku so ku kashe shi akai-akai ba. Stablecoins suna madubin darajar agogo na gargajiya don ba ku dama ga tsayayyen kuɗi wanda zaku iya amfani da su akan Ethereum.
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-more-defi-button: Ƙari akan kuɗin da aka raba ko'ina (DeFi)
page-stablecoins.page-stablecoins-tools-stablecoinswtf-de: Stablecoins.wtf yana ba da shafin sarrafawa tare da bayanan kasuwa na tarihi, ƙididdiga, da abun ciki na ilimi don fitattun stablecoins.

page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-address: Zuba hannun jari na adireshin kwangila
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-address-ca: Mun ƙara sifes domin ya saukaka wajen karanta adireshin
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-checkbox1: Na riga na yi amfani da faifan ƙaddamarwa don saita mai tantance Ethereum ɗina.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-checkbox2: Na gane ina buƙatar na yi anfani da faifai don na saka hannun jari. Turawa cikin sauki ba za tayi aiki ba.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-checkbox3: Zan duba adireshin sa kwangila da sauran wasu abubuwan.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-h2: Nan ba inda za a zuba hannun jari bane
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-launchpad: Zuba hannun jari ta amfani da faifai
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-meta-desc: Tabbatar da adireshin zuba kwangila domin zuba jari a Ethereum.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-meta-title: Hannun jarin Ethereum na saka adireshin kwangila
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-staking: Domin adana ETH ɗin ka, dole sai kunyi anfani da faifai mai inganci da kuma bin umarni. Tura ETH zuwa ga adireshi a wannan shafin bazai mai da kai mai zuba hannun jari ba kuma zai haifar da faɗuwar mu'amala.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-staking-ch: Mu yi tsammanin akwai adireshin bogi dana damfara a ko ina. Don kariya, a duba adireshin zuba hannun jarin da ake anfani a madadin adireshin akan wannan shafin. Muna ba da shawarar duba shi tare da wasu amintattun tushe.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-subtitle: Wannan adireshin na zuba kwangilar Ethereum ne. Yi amfani da wanna shafin don tabbatar da tura kuɗaɗe zuwa ga adireshin na gaskiya yayin zuba hannun jari.
page-staking-deposit-contract.page-staking-deposit-contract-warning-2: Tura kuɗaɗen zuwa ga wannan adireshin bazai yi aiki ba kuma bazai mai dakai mai zuba hannun jari ba. Dole sai kabi umarnin faifai.

page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-current-li-1: Wasu masu asusu na iya bayar da adireshin cire kuɗi a lokacin da suka fara saita adadin kuɗin–waɗannan masun asusu basu wani abu da suke bukatar yi
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-current-li-2: Yawancin masu sa kuɗi ba su samar da adireshin cire kuɗi ba a lokacin saka kuɗi na farko, kuma za su buƙaci sabunta bayanan su na cire kuɗi. Launchpad yana da umarni kan yadda za a yi wannan
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-current-p: Za ku iya shigar da lambar shaidar mai tantancewar ku a nan, dan ku gan ko akwai buƙatar sabunta takarkun shaidarku <Text as="span" fontWeight="normal">(za a iya samun wannan a cikin rajistan ayyukan ku):</Text>
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-title: Sabbin masu sa kuɗi (waɗanda ba su yi ajiya ba)
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-li-1: Ta hanyar asali, sabbin masu saka kuɗi da ke neman ba da damar biyan lada ta atomatik da ayyukan cirewa yakamata su samar da adireshin cirewa na Ethereum da suke sarrafawa lokacin samar da maɓallai masu tabbatarwa ta amfani da kayan aikin saka hannun jari na CLI
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-li-2: Ba a buƙatar wannan a lokacin ajiyar kuɗi, amma zai hana a sabunta waɗannan makullin nan gaba dan buɗe kuɗinku
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-comparison-new-p: Staking Launchpad zai jagorance ku ta hanyar sa kuɗi.
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-credentials-error: Oops! sake duba lambar shaidar tsarin mai tantncewarku sai ku sake gwadawa.
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-credentials-upgraded-1: Fihirisar mai tantancewa {{validatorIndex}} yana shirin da zai fara karɓar kyauta!
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-credentials-upgraded-2: Takardun shaidar cire kuɗi da aka danganta da adireshin farawa:
page-staking.comp-withdrawal-credentials-not-upgraded: Wannan mai tantancewar yana buƙatar haɓakawa.
Wannan Holesky na gwajin 'mai tabbatarwa' na buƙatar sabuntawa.
Ana iya samun umarni a kan yadda ake sabuntawa yanzu a Staking Launchpad
page-staking.page-staking-image-alt: Hoton Rhino mascot domin staking launchpad.
page-staking.page-staking-benefits-1-description: Ana ba da lada don ayyukan da ke taimakawa cimma hanyar sadarwa yarjejeniya. Za ku sami lada don gudanar da manhajar wanda ya na tsari ma’amaloli a cikin sabbin tubalai yadda ya kamata kuma ya bincika aikin sauran masu tabbatarwa saboda wannan shine abin da ke tsari aikin chain.
page-staking.page-staking-benefits-2-description: Hanyar sadarwar ta zama mai karfi da hare-hare yayin da aka kara saka hannun jarin ETH, kamar yadda hakan ke bukatar karin ETH don sarrafa yawancin hanyar sadarwar. Don zama barazana, kuna bukatar rike mafi yawancin masu tantancewa, wanda ke nufin kuna bukatar sarrafa yawancin ETH a cikin tsarin—wannan yana da yawa!
page-staking.page-staking-benefits-3-description: Masu saka hannun jari wato masu saka kuɗi ba sa buƙatar shigar da hujja-na-aiki don shiga cikin tsarewan hanyar sadarwar, ma’ana node na iya aiki akan na’ura mai karancin karfi ta amfani da karamin kuzari.
page-staking.page-staking-benefits-3-link: Ƙarin bayani game da amfani da makamashin Ethereum
page-staking.page-staking-description: Staking shine aikin saka ETH 32 don kunna software mai tantancewa. A matsayin mai tantancewa za ku kasance da alhakin adana bayanai, sarrafa ma'amaloli, da kara sabbin tubalan ga sarkar tubalan. Wannan zai kiyaye Ethereum amintacce ma kowa kuma ku sami sabon ETH a cikin tsari.
page-staking.page-staking-hero-title: Yadda za ka sa ETH ɗinka
page-staking.page-staking-hero-header: Samun kyautuka a yayin da kake tsare Ethereum
page-staking.page-staking-hero-subtitle: Duk wani mai asusu da kowane adadin ETH zai iya taimakawa wajen tsare hanyar sadarwa da samun kyauta a lokacin aikin.
page-staking.page-staking-more-on-solo: Ƙarin bayani akan solo staking na gida
page-staking.page-staking-learn-more-solo: Ƙarin koyo game da solo staking
page-staking.page-staking-more-on-saas: Ƙarin bayani kan sa kuɗ a matsayin aiki
page-staking.page-staking-learn-more-saas: Nemi ƙarin ilimi kan sa kuɗi a matsayin aiki
page-staking.page-staking-more-on-pools: Ƙarin bayani kan sa kuɗin haɗaka
page-staking.page-staking-learn-more-pools: Ƙara koyo game da sa kuɗin haɗaka
page-staking.page-staking-section-why-title: Mesa za ka saka ETH ɗinka?
page-staking.page-staking-section-why-p1: Duk yana dogara ne akan adadin ETH ɗin da kake son yi adana da shi. Za ka buƙaci ETH guda 32 don kunna na'urar tabbatarwarka, amma yana yiwuwa ka yi staking da ƙananan adadi.
page-staking.page-staking-section-why-p2: Duba zaɓuɓɓukan da ke ƙasa ka kuma zaɓi wanda ya fi dacewa da kai da kuma hanyar sadarwa.
page-staking.page-staking-guide-title-rocket-pool: Masu gudanar da Rocket Pool Node
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-solo-p1: Home staking on Ethereum is the gold standard for staking. It provides full participation rewards, improves the decentralization of the network, and never requires trusting anyone else with your funds.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-solo-p2: Those considering staking from home should have some amount of ETH and a dedicated computer connected to the internet ~24/7. Some technical know-how is helpful, but easy-to-use tools now exist to help simplify this process.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-solo-p3: Home stakers can pool their funds with others, or go solo with at least 32 ETH. Liquid staking token solutions can be used to maintain access to DeFi.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-saas-p1: Idan baka so ko baka jin daɗin mu'amala da hardware amma har yanzu kuna son zuba hannun jarin 32 ETH, zaɓuɓɓukan zuba hannun jari suna ba ku damar wakilta bangare mai wahala yayin da kuke samun ladan asali.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-saas-p2: Waɗannan zaɓuɓɓuka a galibi suna tafiya da ku ta hanyar ƙirƙirar saiti na takaddun shaida, loda mukullin budewa zuwa gare su, da ajiye 32 ETH ɗin ku. Wannan yana ba da damar aiki don ingantawa a madadin ku.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-saas-p3: Wannan nau'in jingina na ETH yana buƙatan ka amince da mai samar da jinginan. Dan kiyasta hassara da zai iya aukuwa a wannan kasuwancin, ajiyar mabuɗan sirri na cire ETH dinka tamkar a hannunka suke.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p1: Several pooling solutions exist to assist users who do not have or feel comfortable staking 32 ETH.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p2: Daga cikin jerin zaɓukan da kenan akwai abin da ake kira 'liquid staking' wanda ta wannan hanyar, mutane za su iya jinginar da ETH da suka mallaka kai tsaye. Jingina ta wannan hanyar yana buƙatar alamar shaida manuniya ta ERC-20 da zai nuna adadin ETH da mutum ya jinginar.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p3: Liquid staking makes staking and unstaking as simple as a token swap and enables the use of staked capital in DeFi. This option also allows users to hold custody of their assets in their own Ethereum wallet.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-pools-p4: Sa kuɗi haɗaka ba tare da asalin cibiyar sadarwar Ethereum. Wasu mutane daban suna gina hanyoyin magance su, kuma su zasu ɗauki asarar.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-cex-p1: Yawancin musayan tsakiya suna ba da ayyuka na sa kuɗi idan har ba ku gamsu da riƙe ETH a cikin walet ɗin ku ba. Za su iya zama koma baya don ba ku damar samun ƴan kuɗaɗe a kan riƙe ETH tare da ƙoƙarin sa ido.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-cex-p2: Kasuwancin a nan shi ne cewa masu samar da kayan aiki na tsakiya suna ƙarfafa manyan wuraren saka kuɗi na ETH don gudanar da adadi mai yawa na masu tantancewa. Wannan na iya zama haɗari ga cibiyar sadarwar da masu asusu da ita yayin da take ƙirƙirar babban abu da kuma gazawa, yana sa cibiyar sadarwa ta fuskantanci hari.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-cex-p3: Idan ba ka jin daɗin riƙe naka yan mukulli, ba laifi. Waɗannan zaɓuɓɓukan suna nan muku. A halin yanzu, ku duba shafin walet ɗinmu, inda za ku fara koyan yadda ake sanin gaskiya mallaka akan kuɗin ku. Lokacin da kuka shirya, ku dawo ku inganta wasan ku ta hanyar gwada ɗaya daga cikin ayyukan tara kuɗin da ake bayarwa na sa kuɗi.
page-staking.page-staking-hierarchy-subtext: Kamar yadda wataƙila kun ma lura, akwai hanyoyi da yawa don saka kuɗi a Ethereum. Waɗannan hanyoyin sun shirya ga yawan masu asusu da kuma kowanne ya banbanta ta asara, samun kyauta, ko kuma tsammanin aminci. Wasu ma suna da 'yanci gashin kai, gwajin yaƙi da/ko haɗari fiye da wasu. Muna ba da wasu bayanai game da sanannun ayyukan a fadin duniya, amma ko da yaushe kuyi naku binciken kafin tura ETH a ko'ina.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-solo-saas: Tare da masu samar da SaaS har yanzu ana buƙatar ku saka ETH 32, amma ba lallai ne ku gudanar da kayan na'urar ba. Kullum kuna ci gaba da samun dama ga mabudin tantancewa, amma kuma kuna buƙatar ku raba mabudin shiga don mai aiki ya yi aiki a madadin mai tantancewar ku. Wannan yana gabatar da kofar yarda da ba ta samuwa a lokacin gudanar da kayan na'urar ku, kuma ba kamar sa kuɗi a gida ba, SaaS baya taimakawa sosai wajen rarraba nodes. Idan hankalinku bai kwanta ba wajen gudanarwa amma har yanzu zaku saka ETH 32, yin amfani da SaaS na iya zama zaɓi mai kyau a gare ku.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-solo-pools: Solo staking yana da amfani sosai fiye da saka kuɗi tare da aikin haɗaka, amma yana ba da cikakkiyar damar samun kyautan ETH, da cikakken iko akan saiti da tsaron tantancewar ku. Pooled staking yana da ƙarancin hanyar shiga. Masu amfani za su iya saka kuɗi kaɗan na ETH, ba a buƙatar su samar da mabudi masu inganci, kuma ba su da buƙatun wani abu fiye daidaitaccen intanet mai karfi. Kudin Liquidity suna ba da damar fita daga hannun jari kafin a saka wannan a matakin yarjejeniya. Idan kuna sha'awar waɗannan tsarin, sa kuɗin hadaka na iya dacewa.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-saas-solo: Kamanceceniya sun haɗa da samun maɓallanku ingantattu ba tare da tara kuɗi ba, amma tare da SaaS dole ne ku amince da wani ɓangaren mutum na uku, wanda zai iya yin mugunta ko ya zama makasudin kai hari ko tsari da kansu. Idan waɗannan zato na amana ko haɗin kai suna damun ku, ma'auni na zinare na cin gashin kai shine babban abun sakawa na mutum ɗaya.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-saas-pools: Waɗannan suna kama da cewa gabaɗaya kun dogara ne ga wani don gudanar da abokin ciniki mai tantancewa, amma ba kamar SaaS ba, sa kuɗi na haɗaka yana ba ku damar shiga tare da ƙaramin adadin ETH. Idan kuna neman hannun jari tare da ƙasa da ETH 32, yi la'akari da duba waɗannan.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-pools-solo: Pooled staking has a significantly lower barrier to entry when compared to home staking, but comes with additional risk by delegating all node operations to a third-party, and with a fee. Home staking gives full sovereignty and control over the choices that go into choosing a staking setup. Stakers never have to hand over their keys, and they earn full rewards without any middlemen taking a cut.
page-staking.page-staking-comparison-pools-saas: Waɗannan suna kama da cewa masu ruwa da tsaki ba sa gudanar da software mai inganci da kansu, amma ba kamar zaɓuɓɓukan haɗawa ba, SaaS yana buƙatar cikakken ajiya na 32 ETH don kunnawa mai inganci. Kyauta yana taruwa ga mai saka kuɗi, kuma yawanci ya ƙunshi kuɗin kowane wata ko wani gungumen ajiya don amfani da sabis ɗin. Idan kun fi son maɓallan ingantaccen ku da kuma kuna neman yin manyan ajiya aƙalla ETH 32, yin amfani da sabis ɗin SaaS na iya zama zaɓi mai kyau a gare ku.
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-1-descr: Lamba mai muhimmanci shine tushen buɗewa wato 100% kuma yana samuwa ga jama'a don fork da amfani
page-staking.page-staking-considerations-solo-2-descr: Anyi nazarin lamba mai muhimmaci, kuma an tantance shi an sami sakamakon da kowa zai iya gani

page-staking.page-staking-launchpad-widget-p2: Idan kun gamsu da shi, za ku iya saita duk abin da ake buƙata daga layin umarni ta amfani da Staking Launchpad kaɗai.
page-staking.page-staking-launchpad-widget-p3: Don sauƙaƙa abubuwa, duba wasu kayan aikin da jagororin da ke kasa waɗanda za su iya taimaka muku da Staking Launchpad don saita abokin ciniki cikin sauki.

page-staking.page-staking-faq-1-answer: Shimai tantancewahaɓaka ne mai kama-da-wane wanda ke rayuwa akan Ethereum kuma yana shiga cikin yarjejeniya ta ka'idar Ethereum. Ana wakilta masu tabbatar da ma'auni, maɓallin jama'a, da sauran kaddarorin. Abokin ciniki na mai tantancewa shine manhajar da ke aiki a madadin mai inganci ta hanyar riƙewa da amfani da maɓallai na sirri. Abokin ingantawa guda ɗaya na iya ɗaukar nau'i-nau'in maɓallai da yawa, yana sarrafa masu inganci da yawa.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-2-question: Me yasa nake buƙatar samun kuɗi a cikin adana kuɗi?
page-staking.page-staking-faq-2-answer: Mai tantancewa yana da ikon ba da shawara da kuma tabbatar da toshe hanyoyin sadarwa. Don hana halin rashin gaskiya, masu amfani dole ne su sami kuɗinsu a kan gungumen jingina. Wannan yana ba da damar ƙa'ida don hukunta masu aikata abubuwa marasa kyau. Tsayawa hanya ce ta kiyaye ku da gaskiya, saboda ayyukanku za su sami sakamakon kuɗi.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-3-answer-p1: Babu wata kuɗin ta 'Eth2' ta asali disa ƙa'ida, kamar yadda alamar ether ta asali (ETH) ba ta canza ba a lokacin da Ethereum ya canza zuwa hujjar-kuɗi.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-3-answer-p2: Akwai kuɗin da aka samo asali/tickers wadanda zasu iya wakiltar ETH da aka saka (kaman. rETH daga Pool Rocket, stETH daga Lido, ETH2 daga Coinbase). Ƙara koyo game da haɗakar sa kuɗi
page-staking.page-staking-faq-4-answer-p1: E. Anfara Jingina tun 1 ga watan Disamba, 2020
page-staking.page-staking-faq-4-answer-p2: Wannan yana nufin cewa a halin yanzu masu asusu suna iya saka ETH din su, don gudanar da client na mai tabbatarwa, su fara samun kyauta.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-4-answer-p3: An kammala haaka Shanghai/Capella a ranar 12 ga Afrilu, 2023, wanda ya ba da damar cire kuɗi, yana rufe akan kudin ruwa.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-5-question: Yaushe zan iya cire ETH da na ajje?
page-staking.page-staking-faq-5-answer-p1: A yanzu haka! masu saka kuɗi suna da 'yanci su janye kyauta da / ko ajiyar farko daga ma'auni na masu tantancewa idan sun zaɓɓa.
page-staking.page-staking-faq-5-answer-p2: Masu saka kuɗi kuma za su sami lada ta nau'in kudi da MEV lokacin da suke ba da shawarar block, waɗanda aka samar nan da nan ta hanyar adireshin mai karɓar kuɗin da aka saita.

page-staking.subscribe-to-ef-blog: Yi rajista ga EF Blog don karɓar sanarwar imel don sabbin sanarwa na yarjejeniya.

page-translatathon.translatathon-apply-now-desc: Apply now to participate in the Translatathon

page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-bug-hunting-d: Find and report bugs in consensus layer upgrade specifications or the clients themselves. You can earn up to $50,000 USD and earn a place on the leaderboard.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-desc-1: Running a client means you'll be an active participant in Ethereum. Your client will help keep track of transactions and check new blocks.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-desc-2: If you have ETH, you can stake it to become a validator and help secure the network. As a validator you can earn ETH rewards.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-desc-3: Join the community testing effort! Help test Ethereum upgrades before they're shipped, find bugs, and earn rewards.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-how: How do you want to get involved?
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-how-desc: The Ethereum community will always benefit from more folks running clients, staking, and bug hunting.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-join-desc: Like most things with Ethereum, a lot of the research is public. This means you can take part in the discussions or just read through what the Ethereum researchers have to say. ethresear.ch covers a number of topics including consensus upgrades, rollups and more.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-meta-descript: How to participate in Ethereum upgrades: run nodes, stake, hunt bugs and more.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-run-clients-d: A 'client' is software that runs the blockchain, and in the case of Ethereum, a full node requires running a pair of these clients: an execution layer client and a consensus layer client. A full node can check transactions and, if also staking ETH, can create new blocks. Each client has its own features but performs the same function overall, so we encourage you to choose a minority client whenever possible to keep the client pool diverse and secure.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-run-clients-e: These clients were formerly referred to as 'Eth1' clients, but this term is being deprecated in favor of 'execution layer' clients.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-run-clients-c: These clients were formerly referred to as 'Eth2' clients, but this term is being deprecated in favor of 'consensus layer' clients.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-stake-desc: You can now stake your ETH to help secure the beacon chain.
page-upgrades-get-involved.page-upgrades-get-involved-subtitle: Here's all the ways you can help with Ethereum and future upgrade-related efforts.

page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-answer-1: The Beacon Chain was used as a tool to upgrade Ethereum Mainnet at The Merge.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-answer-2: With The Merge, Ethereum had its most substantial upgrade ever swapping proof-of-work for a new proof-of-stake based consensus layer.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-answer-4: The Beacon Chain was used to develop the proof-of-stake-based consensus Ethereum uses today. It was run separately to Ethereum Mainnet so developers could observe the consensus mechanism in isolation before using it to coordinate real activity.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-author-eip-4844: Vitalik Buterin, Dankrad Feist, Diederik Loerakker, George Kadianakis, Matt Garnett, Mofi Taiwo
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-two-point-oh: Two Point Oh: The Beacon Chain
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-beacon-chain-: The Beacon Chain Ethereum 2.0 explainer you need to read first
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-sharding-is-g: Why sharding is great: demystifying the technical properties
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-sharding-das: An explanation of sharding and data availability sampling (DAS)
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrade-article-title-state-of-the-: The State of The Merge: An Update on Ethereum’s Merge to Proof of Stake in 2022
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-beacon-chain-date: The Beacon Chain went live on December 1, 2020
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-beacon-chain-desc: The Beacon Chain brought staking to Ethereum and laid the groundwork for future upgrades. It coordinates the new proof-of-stake Ethereum.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-clients: Check out the consensus clients (previously known as 'Eth2' clients)
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-dive-desc: How are we making Ethereum more scalable, secure, and sustainable? All while keeping Ethereum's core ethos of decentralization.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-merge-answer-1: The Merge was when Ethereum transitioned to proof-of-stake consensus on September 15, 2022. The Beacon Chain merged with Mainnet, officially deprecating proof-of-work on Ethereum, and reduced Ethereum’s energy consumption by ~99.95%.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-merge-desc: Mainnet Ethereum merged with the proof-of-stake Beacon Chain, marking the end of energy-intensive mining.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-help: Want to help with the Ethereum upgrades?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-help-desc: There are plenty of opportunities to weigh in on the Ethereum upgrades, help with testing, and even earn rewards.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-index-staking-desc: Key to the Ethereum upgrades is the introduction of staking. If you want to use your ETH to help secure the Ethereum network, make sure you follow these steps.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-index-staking-learn-desc: The Beacon Chain brought staking to Ethereum. If you have ETH, you can do a public good by securing the network and earn more ETH in the process.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-index-staking-step-1-desc: To stake on Ethereum you'll need to use the launchpad - this will walk you through the process.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-index-staking-step-2-desc: Before you stake your ETH, be sure to check you've got the right address. You must have gone through the launchpad before doing this.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-meta-desc: An overview of the Ethereum upgrades and the vision they hope to make a reality.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-1-desc: Ethereum is being upgraded progressively; the upgrades are distinct with different ship dates.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-2-title: Is the Beacon Chain a separate blockchain?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-2-desc: Yes. The Beacon Chain was the name given to a parallel proof-of-stake blockchain used to upgrade Ethereum's Mainnet. There is now only one blockchain, formed by merging the original Ethereum blockchain and the Beacon Chain together.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-3-answer-2a: The Merge had minimal impact on dapp developers - they still interact with Ethereum in the same ways.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-3-answer-2b: Sharding plans are still being developed, but will be designed with layer 2 rollups in mind.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-3-desc: You don't have to do anything right now to prepare for the upgrades.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-3-title: How do I prepare for the upgrades?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-4-answer-1: Whenever you send a transaction or use a dapp today, you're using the execution layer, also known as Mainnet.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-4-answer-3: Since The Merge, validators secure the entire network via proof-of-stake.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-4-answer-6: Anyone can become a validator by staking their ETH.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-4-desc: Before The Merge, the Ethereum blockchain was sometimes referred to as 'Eth1.' This term was phased out in favor of the 'execution layer'.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-5-answer-1: To become a validator on the network, you'll need to stake 32 ETH. If you don't have that much, or aren't willing to stake that much, you can join staking pools. These pools will let you stake less and earn fractions of the total rewards.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-5-desc: You'll need to use the staking launchpad or join a staking pool.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-3: Danny Ryan of the Ethereum foundation regularly updates the community:
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-4: Ben Edgington of ConsenSys has a weekly newsletter about the Ethereum upgrades:
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-5: You can also join the discussion on Ethereum research and development at ethresear.ch.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-title: What do I need to do with my dapp?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-desc: The Merge was designed to have minimal impact on dapp developers, though there were a couple of small changes worth noting.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-1: Dapp developers familiar with pre-merge Ethereum should be aware of some changes. These changes include block structure and timing, a few opcode changes, sources of onchain randomness and the concept of epoch finalization.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-6-answer-1-link: How The Merge Impacted Ethereum's Application Layer
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-7-desc: Many different teams from all over the community are working on the various Ethereum upgrades.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-answer-1: The Ethereum upgrades will help Ethereum scale in a decentralized way, while maintaining security, and increasing sustainability.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-answer-2: Perhaps the most obvious problem is that Ethereum needs to be able to handle more than 15-45 transactions per second. But the upgrades also address some other problems with Ethereum today.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-answer-3: The network at times of high demand leaves Ethereum expensive to use. Nodes in the network are struggling under the size of Ethereum and the amount of data their computers are having to process. The original algorithm that underlaid Ethereum security and decentralization was energy intensive and needed to be greener.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-answer-4: A lot of what's changing has always been on the Ethereum roadmap, even since 2015. But current conditions are making the need for the upgrades even greater.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-8-desc: The Ethereum we use today needs to offer a better experience to end users and network participants.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-answer-1: The most active role you can play is to stake your ETH.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-answer-2: You may also want to run a second client to help improve client diversity.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-answer-3: If you're more technical, you can help catch bugs in the new clients.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-answer-4: You can also weigh in on the technical discussions with Ethereum researchers at ethresear.ch.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-desc: You don't have to be technical to contribute. The community is looking for contributions from all kinds of skill sets.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-title: How can I contribute to Ethereum upgrades?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-9-more: Find more general ways to get involved with Ethereum
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-0: The term 'Eth2' itself is being phased out, as it does not represent a single upgrade or new network. It is more accurately a set of multiple upgrades that all do their part to make Ethereum more scalable, secure, and sustainable. The network you know and love will simply be referred to as Ethereum.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-1: We're reluctant to talk too much in terms of a technical roadmap because this is software: things can change. We think it's easier to understand what's happening when you read about the outcomes.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-2: But if you've followed the discussions, here's how the upgrades fit into technical roadmaps, and a bit on how they're changing.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-3: Phase 0 described the work to get the Beacon Chain live.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-5: Phase 1 originally focused on implementing the shard chains, but prioritization shifted to The Merge, which shipped on September 15, 2022.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-6: Phase 1.5 was originally planned to follow shard implementations when Mainnet would be added as the last shard to the Beacon Chain. However, as rollup technology progressed, the Ethereum community expedited the transition away from proof-of-work instead.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-10-answer-7: The plans around Phase 2 have been a point of intense research and discussion. With The Merge behind us, and the advancements in layer 2 solutions, goals have shifted to provide a more simplified form of data sharding to maximize rollup efficiency. Current layer 2s enable the ability to scale transaction execution, and sharding will allow for storage of proofs for this data on layer 1 in a cheap and scalable manner.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-11-desc: No. There is no Eth2 token, and your ETH did not change after The Merge.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-11-answer-1: One of the driving forces behind the Eth2 rebrand was the common misconception that ETH holders were required to migrate their ETH to 'ETH 2.0' after The Merge or any other upgrade. This is not true and never has been.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question-11-answer-2: This confusion is commonly exploited by scammers.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-question3-answer-1: ETH holders don't need to do anything. Your ETH will not need changing or upgrading. There's almost certain to be scams telling you otherwise, so be careful.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-scalable-desc: Ethereum needs to support 1000s of transactions per second, to make applications faster and cheaper to use.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-secure-desc: Ethereum needs to be more secure. As the adoption of Ethereum grows, the protocol needs to become more secure against all forms of attack.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-shard-date: Sharding will follow The Merge in multiple phases, sometime in 2023-2024.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-shard-desc: Danksharding will expand Ethereum's capacity to store data, and work harmoniously with L2s to scale throughput and reduce network fees. Danksharding will be rolled out in multiple stages, starting with ProtoDanksharding.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-stay-up-to-date-desc: Get the latest from the researchers and developers working on the Ethereum upgrades.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-sustainable-desc: Ethereum was energy-intense until recently. The transition to proof-of-stake brought a network energy reduction of over 99.9%.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-take-part-desc: Ethereum researchers and enthusiasts alike meet here to discuss research efforts, including everything related to Ethereum upgrades.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-the-upgrades-desc: Ethereum upgrades aim to improve the network's scalability, security, and sustainability. Ethereum has recently undergone some major upgrades to security and sustainability, and there are more coming in the future, especially relating to scalability.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-unofficial-roadmap: This is not the official roadmap. This is how we view what's happening based on the information out there. But this is technology, things can change in an instant. So please don't read this as a commitment.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-upgrade-desc: The Ethereum we know and love, just more scalable, more secure, and more sustainable...
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-upgrading: Upgrading Ethereum to radical new heights
page-upgrades-index.page-roadmap-vision-desc: To bring Ethereum into the mainstream and serve all of humanity, we have to make Ethereum more scalable, secure, and sustainable.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-1: The term 'Eth2' was commonly used before The Merge but is being phased out in favor of more precise terminology.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-2: Since merging 'Eth1' and 'Eth2', there are no longer two distinct Ethereum blockchains; there is only Ethereum.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-3: To limit confusion, the community has updated these terms:
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-3-1: 'Eth1' is now the 'execution layer', which handles transactions and execution.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-3-2: 'Eth2' is now the 'consensus layer', which handles proof-of-stake consensus.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-happened-to-eth2-4: These terminology updates only change naming conventions; this does not alter Ethereum's goals or roadmap.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-why-cant-we-just-use-eth2-: Why can't we just use Eth2?

One major problem with the Eth2 branding is that it creates a broken mental model for new users of Ethereum. They intuitively think that Eth1 comes first and Eth2 comes after. Or that Eth1 ceases to exist once Eth2 exists. Neither of these is true. By removing Eth2 terminology, we save all future users from navigating this confusing mental model.

As the roadmap for Ethereum has evolved, Ethereum 2.0 has become an inaccurate representation of Ethereum’s roadmap. Being careful and accurate in our word choice allows content on Ethereum to be understood by the broadest audience possible.

Unfortunately, malicious actors have attempted to use the Eth2 misnomer to scam users by telling them to swap their ETH for ‘ETH2’ tokens or that they must somehow migrate their ETH before the Eth2 upgrade. We hope this updated terminology will bring clarity to eliminate this scam vector and help make the ecosystem safer.

Some staking operators have also represented ETH staked on the Beacon Chain with the ‘ETH2’ ticker. This creates potential confusion, given that users of these services are not actually receiving an ‘ETH2’ token. No ‘ETH2’ token exists; it simply represents their share in that specific providers’ stake.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-to-do: What do you need to do?
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-what-to-do-desc: If you're a dapp user or ETH holder, you don't need to do anything. If you're a developer or want to start staking, there are ways you can get involved today.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-whats-next-desc: The Ethereum roadmap involves interconnected protocol upgrades that will make the network more scalable, more secure, and more sustainable. These upgrades are being built by multiple teams from across the Ethereum ecosystem.
page-upgrades-index.page-upgrades-security-link: More on security and scam prevention

page-upgrades.page-upgrades-merge-infographic-el: Ethereum State: transactions, apps, contracts, balances
page-upgrades.page-upgrades-merge-infographic-alt-text: Infographic illustrating how the Beacon Chain merges into Ethereum's execution layer during the transition from proof-of-work to proof-of-stake.
page-upgrades.page-upgrades-post-merge-banner-tutorial: This tutorial is out of date after the merge and may not work. Please raise a PR if you would like to contribute.
page-upgrades.consensus-beaconscan-desc: Beacon Chain explorer - Etherscan for the consensus layer
page-upgrades.consensus-become-staker-desc: Staking is live! If you want to stake your ETH to help secure the network, make sure you’re aware of the risks.
page-upgrades.consensus-run-beacon-chain-desc: Ethereum needs as many clients running as possible. Help with this Ethereum public good!

page-wallets.page-wallets-bookmarking: Sa alama a walet ɗin ka

Walat ɗin ku yana ba ku damar shiga aikace-aikace, karanta ma'auni, aika ma'amaloli da tabbatar da asalin ku.

page-wallets.page-wallets-get-some-alt: Misalin hannun da aka kero tambarin ETH wanda akayi da legon bullo
page-wallets.page-wallets-get-some-desc: ETH shine asalin kuɗin Ethereum. Kuna buƙatar ETH a cikin asusun ku don amfani da manhajar Ethereum.
page-wallets.page-wallets-keys-to-safety: Dabarar ajje kiripto ɗin ka a aminci
page-wallets.page-wallets-manage-funds: Manhajar dake amfani wurin kula da kuɗaɗen ka
page-wallets.page-wallets-manage-funds-desc: Walet ɗin ka yana nuna muku ragowar kuɗin ku, tarihin kasuwancu, kuma yana ba ku hanyar aikawa da karɓar kuɗi. Wasu walat ɗin na iya bayar da karin fasali.
page-wallets.page-wallets-meta-description: Abinda yakamata ka sani wurin amfani da Ethereum walet.
page-wallets.page-wallets-mobile: Manhajojin waya masu taimakawa wajen amfani da kuɗaɗen ka a ko ina
page-wallets.page-wallets-most-wallets: Yawancin kayan aikin walat za su ba ku damar kirkirar asusun Ethereum. Don haka, ba ku buƙatar samun daya kafin ku sauke walet.
page-wallets.page-wallets-seed-phrase-desc: Walet masu yawa sau da yawa za su ba ku jumlar iri wadda dole ne ku rubuta wani wuri mai aminci. Wannan ita ce kawai hanyar da za ku iya dawo da walat ɗin ku.
page-wallets.page-wallets-seed-phrase-snippet: there aeroplane curve vent formation doge possible product distinct under spirit lamp
page-wallets.page-wallets-seed-phrase-write-down: Kar ka ajiye shi a kwamfuta. Rubuta shi a takarda ka ajiye shi.
page-wallets.page-wallets-slogan: Riƙe mabuɗan ci gaban goben dijital ɗin ka
page-wallets.page-wallets-stay-safe: Yadda za a zama cikin aminci
page-wallets.page-wallets-stay-safe-desc: 'Yancin kuɗi da ikon samun dama ta amfani da kuɗi a ko'ina ya zo tare da alhakin - babu tallafin abokin ciniki a cikin kiript. Kai ne ke da alhakin kiyaye maɓallan ku lafiya da tsaro.
page-wallets.page-wallets-subtitle: Walet suna taimaka muku samun damar kadarorin ku na dijital da shiga manhajoji.
page-wallets.page-wallets-take-responsibility: Ka samu cikakkiyar dama da kuɗaɗen ka
page-wallets.page-wallets-take-responsibility-desc: Matsakaicin musanya zai danganta walat ɗin ku zuwa sunan mai asusu da kalmar sirriwaɗanda zaku iya dawo dasu ta hanyar asali. Ka tuna kawai kuna amincewa da wannan musayar tare da tsarewa akan kuɗin ka. Idan musayar yana da matsalar kuɗi, kuɗin ku zai kasance cikin haɗari.
page-wallets.page-wallets-tips: Ƙarin shawarwari akan zama cikin tsaro
page-wallets.page-wallets-triple-check-desc: Ka tuna ba za a iya mayar da ciniki ba, kuma ba za a iya dawo da wallet ɗin cikin sauƙi ba don haka yi taka tsantsan kuma koyaushe a yi hankali.
page-wallets.page-wallets-try-dapps-alt: Misalin memboli na al'ummar Ethereum suna yin aiki tare
page-wallets.page-wallets-try-dapps-desc: Dapps manhajoji ne da aka ginawa akan Ethereum. Sun fi arha, adalci da kuma daɗi akan bayanan ku fiye da yawancin manhajojin asali.
page-wallets.page-wallets-types-desc: Akwai ɗan wasu hanyoyin mu'amala da kasuwancin asusun ku:
page-wallets.page-wallets-web-browser: Walet ɗin burauza manhajojin shafin intanet waɗanda ke ba ka damar yin hulɗa da asusunka kai tsaye a cikin burauzar
page-wallets.page-wallets-web-browser-extension: Walet na burauza kari ne da kuke sauka waɗanda ke ba ku damar yin hulɗa da asusunku da manhajoji ta hanyar burauzar
page-wallets.page-wallets-your-ethereum-account-desc: Walat ɗin kishine taga ku a cikin asusun Ethereum - ma'auni, tarihin ma'amala da ƙari. Amma kuna iya musanya masu samar da walat a kowane lokaci.
page-wallets.page-wallets-your-login-desc: Walat ɗin ka yana ba ku damar haɗawa da manhajoji ta amfani da asusun Ethereum. Yana kama da shiga da za ku iya amfani da shi a cikin manhajoji da yawa.

page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-alt-img-bazaar: Hoton wani mutum a cikin tsakiyar kasuwa mai shaguna, wanda ke nuni da Ethereum
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-alt-img-comm: Misalin memboli na al'ummar Ethereum suna yin aiki tare
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-alt-img-lego: Misalin hannun da aka kero tambarin ETH wanda akayi da legon bullo
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-banking-card-desc: Ba kowane ke da damar yin hidima na kuɗi ba. Haɗin intanet shine duk abin da kuke buƙata don samun damar Ethereum da bayar rance, aro, da ajiya da aka gina akan sa.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-build-desc: Idan kuna so ku yi gini da Ethereum, ku karanta takardun mu don karin bayani, kuyi kokarin kallar koyarwar mu, ko kuma ku duba kayan aiki da kuke buƙata domin farawa.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-censorless-card-de: Babu wata gwamnati ko kuma wani kamfani da yake faɗa aji akan Ethereum. 'yancin gashin kansa ne yasa ya zama kusan babu wanda ya isa ya hanaka karɓar kuɗaɗe ko kuma anfani da ayyukan sa shi Ethereum din.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-comm-desc: Al'ummar mu sun haɗa da mutane daga ko ina, sun haɗa da masu zane, 'yan kiripto, manyan kamfanoni, da kuma ku yanzu. Nemo yadda za ku iya shiga a yau.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-commerce-card-desc: Kwastomomi suna da amintaccen tsari da aka tsara don ganin an bawa kuɗaɗensu kariya, ta hanyar da sai sun bada abunda aka yarda dashi kafin a canza musu tsari. Hakanan suma masu kirkira wato developers, sunada tabbacin ƙa'idodin baza su canzu a kansu ba.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-composable-card-de: Dukkan manhajojin an gina sune akan blockchain guda ɗaya, tare da bari a dunƙule a waje guda, wannan yana nufin cewa za'a su iya gina kansu (kamar bulon Lego). Wannan yana ba da damar samar da ingantattun samfura da gogewa da kuma tabbacin cewa babu wanda zai iya cire duk wani kayan aikin da aka dogara da su.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-internet-card-desc: Kowa zai iya kasuwanci da network ɗin Ethereum ko kuma yin gini a kanta, Wannan zai baka damar sarrafa kaddarorinka da kuma asalinka, maimakon wasu 'yan kamfanoni su sarrafa maka.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-meta-description: Koyi game da Ethereum, abunda take yi da kuma tayaya za ka yi anfani da ita.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-p2p-card-desc: Ethereum na bada damar tsarawa, yin yarjejeniya ko tura kadarorin shafin intanet kai tsaye tare da sauran mutane. Ba ku buƙatar dogaron masu shiga tsakani.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-subtitle: Cikakken jagora ga masu koyo akan yadda Ethereum yake aiki, fa'idodin da yake kawowa da kuma yadda miliyoyin mutane ke amfani da shi a duk duniya.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-blockchain-tab-con: Blockchain kundin bayanan kasuwanci ne wanda ake sabunta shi da kuma rarrabashi a cikin kwamfutoci ta hanyar sadarwa. Duk lokacin da aka kara sabuwar mu'amala, ana kiranta "block" daga nan ne aka sami sunan blockchain. Blockchain din kowa da kowa kamar Ethereum yana bada dama ga kowa, don a sanya bayani, amma banda cire shi. Saboda haka idan mutum yana so ya cire wani bayani ko yayi satar bayanai a cikin kwanfutar, akwai bukatar sai ya cire bayanan a cikin kwanfutocin dukka, kunga abune mai wahala! Saboda haka wannan ne yasa blockchain mai 'yancin gashin kanta kamar Ethereum take da matukar tsaro.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-cryptocurrency-tab: Kuɗin kiripto kalma ce da ake amfani da ita don siffanta nau'ikan alamun kuɗin dijital waɗanda aka tsare su ta amfani da blockchain. Duka ya fara ne da Bitcoin. Bitcoin na iya anfani dashi don tura abun mai daraja tsakani mutane biyu ba tare da amincewar dan tsakiya ba. Kawai zaku amince ne da tsarin Bitcoin, wanda duk a buɗe yake kuma kyauta.

Dalilin da yasa kadarori kamar su bitcoin da ether ake kiransu da “cryptocurrencies”, saboda tsaron bayanan ku da kuma kadarorin da kuke da tabbacicryptography, bawai iya kawai amincewa da wata cibiya ko kuma kamfani kafin ayi abun gaskiya ba.

Ethereum na da nasa cryptocurrency na ainihi, ether (ETH), wanda ake amfani dashi don biyan wasu ayyukan akan hanyar sadarwa. Ana iya canza su zuwa ga wasu mutane ko kuma musanya shi don wasu kuɗin shafin intanet wato token akan Ethereum. Ether na musamman ne saboda ana amfani dashi don biyan lissafin da ake buƙata don ginawa da gudanar da manhajoji da ƙungiyoyi akan Ethereum.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-summary-desc-1: Ethereum cibiyar sadarwa ce ta kwamfutoci a duk faɗin duniya waɗanda ke bin ƙa'idodin da ake kira ka'idar Ethereum. Cibiyar sadarwar Ethereum tana aiki a matsayin tushe ga al'ummomi, manhajoji, ƙungiyoyi da kadarorin yanar gizo wanda kowa zai iya ginawa da amfani da shi.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-summary-desc-2: Za ku iya buɗe account ɗin Ethereum daga ko ina, a kowanne lokaci, kuma ku bincika duniyar manhajoji ko ku gina naku. Babban fasahar shine zaku iya yin duk wannan ba tare da amincewa da wata hukuma ta tsakiya ba wacce zata iya canza ƙa'idodi ko takura muku a wajen shiga.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-summary-bullet-4: No company owns Ethereum or decides its future
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-btc-eth-diff-title: Menene bambanci tsakanin Ethereum da Bitcoin?
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-btc-eth-diff-1: An ƙaddamar da shi a 2015, an gina Ethereum akan fasahar Bitcoin, tare da wasu manyan bambance.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-btc-eth-diff-2: Duka suna ba damar amfani da kuɗin yanar gizo ba tare da masu ba da biyan kuɗi ba ko kuma bankuna. Amma Ethereum na da shirye-shirye , don haka kuna iya gina da kuma tura manhajoji masu 'yancin gashin kansu akan hanyar sadarwar sa.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-btc-eth-diff-3: Bitcoin na ba mu damar aika saƙonni ga juna game da abin da muke tunanin yana da daraja. Samar da ƙima ba tare da iko ba ya riga ya yi ƙarfi sosai. Ethereum ya tsawaita wannan: maimakon kawai saƙonni, zaku iya rubuta kowane shiri na gaba ɗaya, ko kuma kwangila. Babu iyaka ga nau'in kwangilolin da za a iya ƙirƙira da kuma yarda da su, saboda haka babban fasahar tana faruwa ne akan hanyar sadarwar Ethereum.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-btc-eth-diff-4: A lokacin da Bitcoin na hanyar sadarwar biyan kuɗi ce kawai, Ethereum ya fi kama da kasuwar harkallar kuɗaɗe, wasanni, cibiyoyin sadarwar na jama'a da sauran manhajoji.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-why-would-i-use-et: Menene yasa zanyi anfani da Ethereum?

Idan kuna buƙatar ƙarin juriya, buɗewa, da amintattun hanyoyin daidaito a duk duniya, samar da ƙungiyoyi, gina manhajoji da raba daraja, Ethereum na ku ne. Ethereum labari ne wanda muka rubuta dukkanmu, don haka ku zo ku gano waɗanne duniyoyi ne masu ban mamaki da al'ajabi za mu iya ginawa tare da shi.
Ethereum kuma ya kasance mai mahimmanci ga mutanen da suka fama da rashin tabbas game da tsaro ko ji ko tafiyar da kadarorin su saboda masu kutse wanda suka fi karfin ikonsu.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-slide-1-title: Rahusa da Saurin Biyan Kuɗin Ketare
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-slide-1-desc-1: Stablecoins sabon nau'in cryptocurrency ne wanda ya dogara da ingancin kadara a matsayin tushen ƙimar sa. Yawancin su na da alaƙa da dalar Amurka don haka suna kula da darajar wannan kuɗin. Waɗannan suna ba da izinin tsarin biyan kuɗi na duniya mai arha da kwanciyar hankali. Yawancin kwanciyar hankali na yanzu an gina su akan hanyar sadarwar Ethereum.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-slide-1-desc-2: Ethereum da stablecoins suna sauƙaƙa tsarin aika kuɗi zuwa ketare. Yawancin lokaci yana ɗaukar ƴan mintuna kaɗan don tura kuɗi a faɗin duniya, saɓanin kwanakin kasuwanci da yawa ko kuma makonni wanda zai iya ɗaukar matsakaicin bankin ku, kuma ga ɗan ƙaramin farashi. Kuma babu ƙarin kuɗi don yin mu'amala mai ƙima, kuma babu ƙuntatawa akan ina ko me yasa kuke aika kuɗin ku.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-slide-2-title: Mafi Saurin Taimako A Lokutan Rikici
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-slide-2-desc-1: Idan kuna da sa'a don samun zaɓukan banki da yawa ta hanyar amintattun cibiyoyin inda kuke zaune, kuna iya samun 'yancin kuɗi, tsaro da kwanciyar hankali da suke bayarwa. Amma ga mutane da yawa a duniya da ke fuskantar matsin lamba na siyasa ko matsalar tattalin arziki, cibiyoyin kuɗaɗe bai zama lalle su iya bada kariya ko abunda ake buƙata bah.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-slide-2-desc-2: Lokacin da yaƙe-yaƙe, karayar tattalin arziƙi ko tashe-tashen hankula a kan jama'a suka mamaye mutane mazauna Venezuela, Cuba, Afghanistan, Nigeria, Belarus, da Ukraine, cryptocurrencies sun zama mafi sauri kuma sau da yawa sune zaɓi don riƙe hukumar kuɗi.1 Kamar yadda aka gani. A cikin waɗannan misalan, cryptocurrencies kamar Ethereum na iya ba da damar shiga tattalin arzikin duniya mara iyaka lokacin da aka yanke mutane daga wajen duniya. Bugu da ƙari, stablecoins suna ba damar sayar da ƙima lokacin da kuɗin gida ke durkushewa saboda hauhawar farashin kaya.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-slide-3-desc-1: A cikin shekarar 2021 kadai, makirkira, mawaƙa, marubuta, da sauran masu ƙirƙira suka yi amfani da Ethereum don samun kusan dala biliyan 3.5 tare. Wannan ya sa Ethereum ya zama ɗayan manyan dandamali na duniya don masu ƙirƙira, tare da Spotify, YouTube, da Etsy. Ƙara koyo.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-slide-4-desc-1: Buga wasa don samun ƙarin wasanni (inda ake samun lada don buga wasannin) kwanan nan sun fito kuma suna canza masana'antar caca. A al'adance, sau da yawa ana haramta kasuwanci ko canja wurin kadarorin cikin wasan zuwa wasu 'yan wasa don kudade na gaske. Wannan yana tilasta wa 'yan wasa yin amfani da shafukan yanar gizo na kasuwar bayan fage waɗanda galibi suna da haɗarin tsaro. Wasan blockchain ya rungumi tattalin arziƙin cikin-wasan kuma yana haɓaka irin wannan ɗabi'ar ta hanyar aminci.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-slide-4-desc-2: Bugu da ƙari, ƴan wasanni suna samun kwarin gwiwa ta hanyar samun damar yin cinikin alamun wasanni don kuɗi na gaske kuma don haka ana samun lada da gaske don lokacin da suka yo wasan.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-meet-ether-desc-1: Yawancin ayyuka akan hanyar sadarwar Ethereum suna buƙatar wasu ayyuka da za a yi akan kwamfutar da aka sa a Ethereum (wanda aka sani da mashin ɗin Virtual na Ethereum). Wannan lissafin ba kyauta ba ne; Ana biyan shi don amfani da cryptocurrency na asali na Ethereum wanda ake kira ether (ETH). Wannan yana nufin kuna buƙatar aƙalla ƙaramin ether don amfani da hanyar sadarwa.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-meet-ether-desc-2: Ether fasaha ce zalla, kuma za ku iya aika shi ga kowa a ko'ina cikin duniya nan take. Babu wata gwamnati ko kamfanin da ke samar da ether - an rarraba shi kuma a bayyane gaba ɗaya yake. Ana ba da ether daidai gwargwadon ƙa'idar, kawai ga masu ruwa da tsaki waɗanda suke tsaron hanyar sadarwar.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-who-runs-ethereum-: Babu wanda yake sarrafa Ethereum ta kowanne wuri. Yana wanzuwa a duk lokacin da aka sami kwamfutoci masu alaƙa da juna suna gudanar da software din suna bin ka'idar Ethereum kuma suna kara sawa a cikin Ethereum blockchain. Kowane ɗayan waɗannan kwamfutoci an san su da suna node. Kowane mutum na iya gudanar da nodes, kodayake don shiga cikin tabbatar da hanyar sadarwar dole ne ku stake ETH (alamar asali ta Ethereum). Duk wanda ke da 32 ETH zai iya yin wannan ba tare da buƙatar izini ba.

Ko da lambar tushen Ethereum bata iya samar da wani abu guda ɗaya ba. Kowa na iya ba da shawarar canje-canje ga ƙa'ida da kuma tattauna ingantashi. Akwai abubuwa da yawa don aiwatar da ka'idar Ethereum waɗanda ƙungiyoyi masu zaman kansu ke samarwa a cikin yaren programming da yawa, kuma galibi ana gina sune a buɗe kuma suna ƙarfafa gudummawar al'umma.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-smart-contract-des: Smart contracts shi ne shirye-shiryen kwamfuta suna zaune ne akan blockchain na Ethereum. Suna aiwatarwa a lokacin da mai yin amfani da ita yayi kasuwanci. Suna sa Ethereum ya zama mai sauƙi a cikin abin da zai iya yi. Waɗannan shirye-shiryen suna aiki kamar bulo na ginin manhajoji masu 'yancin gashin kai da kuma ƙungiyoyi.

Shin kun taɓa amfani da samfur wanda ya canza sharuɗɗan aikin kan sa? Ko cire fasalin da kuka sam yana da amfani? Da zarar an buga smart contract zuwa Ethereum, zai kasance kan layi kuma yana aiki muddin akwai Ethereum. Ko marubucin ba zai iya sauke shi ba. Tun da smart contracts suna sarrafa kansu, ba sa nuna bambanci ga kowane mai amfani kuma koyaushe a shirye suke don amfani.
Manyan misalan smart contracts sune manhajoji ba da bashi, fagen ciniki masu cin gashin kansu, inshora, kuɗaɗe, cibiyoyin sadarwar jama'a, NFTs - wato duk abin da zaku iya tunani akai.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-criminal-activity-: Na ji ana amfani da kiripto azaman kayan aiki don aikata laifuka. Shin wannan gaskiya ne?

Kamar kowace fasaha, wani lokaci za a yi amfani da ita acikin hanyoyi wanda ba daidai ba. Duk da haka, ma'amaloli na Ethereum suna faruwa akan buɗaɗɗen blockchain, sau da yawa yana da saukin hukuma don bin diddigin ayyukan haram fiye da yadda zai kasance a cikin tsarin kudi na al'ada, me yuwuwa yin Ethereum wani zabi me ban sha'awa ga wadanda za su gwammace ba a gano su ba.
Ana amfani da Kiripto kasa da daidaitanccen kuɗaɗe don dalilai na laifi bisa ga mahimman binciken rahoton kwanan nan daga Europol, Hukumar Tarayyar Turai don haɗin kan Doka:

"Amfani da kɗaɗen kiripto don ayyukan haram da alama ya kunshi dan karamin bagaren tattalin arzikin kuɗin kiripto gabaɗaya, kuma yana da alama ya yi kankanta fiya da adadin kuɗin haram da ke cikin kuɗaɗe na al'ada."
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-energy-title: Menene game da makamashin da Ethereum ke amfani da shi?
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-energy-desc-1: A ranar 15 ga Satumba, 2022, Ethereum ya shiga cikin Haɗuwar sabuntawa wanda ya sauya Ethereum daga hujja-na-aiki zuwa hujja-na-sa-kuɗi.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-energy-desc-2: Haɗewar shine babban haɓakawar Ethereum da kuma rage yawan makamashi da ake buƙata don tsare Ethereum ta 99.95%, samar da mafi amincin cibiyar sadarwa don ƙaramin farashin carbon. Ethereum yanzu shine low-carbon blockchain yayin haɓaka tsaro da kuma ɗorewar sa.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-more-on-energy-con: Ƙari akan makamashin da ake amfani
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-energy-consumption: Amfanin Makamashi na Shekara a cikin TWh/yr shekara-shekara
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-week-in-ethereum-d: - Wasikar bayanan sati sati daya kunshi mahimmam batu game da yanayin muhalli.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-atoms-institutions: Kwayar zarra, Cibiyoyi, Blockchain masu yawa
- Me yasa blockchain masu yawa ke da muhimmanci?
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-ethereum-in-number: Ayyukan da aka gina kan Ethereum
Asusu (walet da yawa) tare da ragowar kuɗin ETH
Ƙimar da aka samu akan Ethereum
Samun mai kirkira akan Ethereum a cikin shekar 2021
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-get-eth-descriptio: ETH shine asalin kuɗin Ethereum. Kuna buƙatar ETH a cikin asusun ku don amfani da manhajojin Ethereum.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-explore-dapps-desc: Dapps manhajoji ne da aka gina akan Ethereum. Dapps suna rusa tsarin kasuwanci na yanzu kuma suna kan ƙirƙirar sababbi.
page-what-is-ethereum.page-what-is-ethereum-summary-desc-3: Ci gaba da yin karatu don karin bayani…

template-usecase.template-usecase-dropdown-dao: Ƙungiyoyin sarrafa kansu na gashin kai (DAOs)
template-usecase.template-usecase-dropdown-social-network: Dandalin yanan Gizo masu cin gashin kansu
template-usecase.template-usecase-banner: Amfani da Ethereum koyaushe yana girma da haɓaka. Ƙara duk wani bayani da kuke tunanin zai sa abubuwa su kasance da haske ko kuma ku sabunta su.
